word.hebrewmodern: משוה רגלי כאילות ועל במתי יעמידני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me, that my feet did not slip.
word.thailand: พระองค์ประทานที่กว้างขวางสำหรับย่างเท้าของข้าพระองค์ เท้าของข้าพระองค์จึงไม่พลาด
word.spanish1909: Ensanchaste mis pasos debajo de mí, Y no titubearon mis rodillas.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Tu hai allargato la via ai miei passi; e i miei piedi non hanno vacillato.
word.german1912: Du machst unter mir Raum zu gehen, daß meine Knöchel nicht wanken.
word.french1910: Tu élargis le chemin sous mes pas, Et mes pieds ne chancellent point.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你使我腳底下的路徑寬闊，我的兩膝沒有動搖。
word.korean: 내 걸음을 넓게 하셨고 나로 실족지 않게 하셨나이다
word.tagalog: Iyong pinalaki ang aking mga hakbang sa ilalim ko, at ang aking mga paa ay hindi nangadulas.
word.maori: I whakanuia e koe oku takahanga i raro i ahau; te paheke oku waewae.
word.cebuano: Gipahalapad mo ang akong mga lakang sa ubos ko, Ug wala mahadalin-as ang akong mga tiil.
word.hebrew: לו  ותתן-לי מגן ישעך    וימינך תסעדני וענותך תרבני
word.hebrewmodern: תרחיב צעדי תחתי ולא מעדו קרסלי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I have wounded them that they were not able to rise: they are fallen under my feet.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์ได้แทงเขาทะลุ เขาจึงไม่สามารถลุกขึ้นได้อีก เขาล้มลงที่ใต้เท้าของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Helos herido, y no podrán levantarse: Cayeron debajo de mis pies.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io li ho abbattuti e non son potuti risorgere; son caduti sotto i miei piedi.
word.german1912: Ich will sie zerschmettern; sie sollen mir nicht widerstehen und müssen unter meine Füße fallen.
word.french1910: Je les brise, et ils ne peuvent se relever; Ils tombent sous mes pieds.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我重創他們，使他們不能起來；他們都倒在我的腳下。
word.korean: 내가 저희를 쳐서 능히 일어나지 못하게 하리니 저희가 내 발 아래 엎드러지리이다
word.tagalog: Aking sasaktan sila, na anopa't sila'y huwag makatayo: sila'y mangalulugmok sa ilalim ng aking mga paa.
word.maori: Maru ana ratou i ahau, te kaha te whakatika: hinga ana ki raro i oku waewae.
word.cebuano: Pagapatyon ko sila, sa pagkaagi nga dili na sila arang makatindog: Mangapukan sila sa ilalum sa akong mga tiil.
word.hebrew: לח  ארדוף אויבי ואשיגם    ולא-אשוב עד-כלותם
word.hebrewmodern: אמחצם ולא יכלו קום יפלו תחת רגלי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For dogs have compassed me: the assembly of the wicked have inclosed me: they pierced my hands and my feet.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าข้า บรรดาสุนัขล้อมรอบข้าพระองค์ไว้ คนทำชั่วหมู่หนึ่งล้อมข้าพระองค์ เขาแทงมือแทงเท้าข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque perros me han rodeado, Hame cercado cuadrilla de malignos: Horadaron mis manos y mis pies.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Poiché cani m’han circondato; uno stuolo di malfattori m’ha attorniato; m’hanno forato le mani e i piedi.
word.german1912: Denn die Hunde haben mich umgeben, und der Bösen Rotte hat mich umringt; sie haben meine Hände und Füße durchgraben.
word.french1910: Car des chiens m'environnent, Une bande de scélérats rôdent autour de moi, Ils ont percé mes mains et mes pieds.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 犬類圍著我，惡黨環繞我，他們扎了我的手我的腳。
word.korean: 개들이 나를 에워쌌으며 악한 무리가 나를 둘러 내 수족을 찔렀나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't niligid ako ng mga aso: kinulong ako ng pulutong ng mga manggagawa ng masama; binutasan nila ang aking mga kamay at ang aking mga paa.
word.maori: Kua karapotia nei hoki ahau e te kirehe, kua muia e te whakaminenga o nga tangata hara: kua pokaia e ratou oku ringa me oku waewae.
word.cebuano: Kay ang mga iro nanaglibut kanako: Usa ka panon sa mamumuhat sa kadautan nanaglikus kanako; Gipalagbasan nila ang akong mga kamot ug ang akong mga tiil.
word.hebrew: טז  יבש כחרש כחי ולשוני מדבק מלקוחי    ולעפר-מות תשפתני
word.hebrewmodern: כי סבבוני כלבים עדת מרעים הקיפוני כארי ידי ורגלי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
word.thailand: ตาของข้าพเจ้าจ้องตรงพระเยโฮวาห์เสมอ เพราะพระองค์จะทรงถอนเท้าของข้าพเจ้าออกจากข่าย
word.spanish1909: Mis ojos están siempre hacia Jehová; Porque él sacará mis pies de la red.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: I miei occhi son del continuo verso l’Eterno, perch’egli è quel che trarrà i miei piedi dalla rete.
word.german1912: Meine Augen sehen stets zu dem HERRN; denn er wird meinen Fuß aus dem Netze ziehen.
word.french1910: Je tourne constamment les yeux vers l'Eternel, Car il fera sortir mes pieds du filet.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的眼睛時常仰望耶和華，因為他必使我的腳脫離網羅。
word.korean: 내 눈이 항상 여호와를 앙망함은 내 발을 그물에서 벗어나게 하실 것임이로다
word.tagalog: Ang aking mga mata ay palaging na sa Panginoon; sapagka't huhugutin niya ang aking mga paa sa silo.
word.maori: ¶ E tau tonu ana oku kanohi ki a Ihowa; mana hoki e unu ake oku waewae i te kupenga.
word.cebuano: Ang akong mga mata sa gihapon gitutuk ngadto kang Jehova; Kay pagahulboton niya ang akong mga tiil gikan sa pukot.
word.hebrew: טו  עיני תמיד אל-יהוה    כי הוא-יוציא מרשת רגלי
word.hebrewmodern: עיני תמיד אל יהוה כי הוא יוציא מרשת רגלי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy: thou hast set my feet in a large room.
word.thailand: และมิได้ทรงมอบข้าพระองค์ไว้ในมือของศัตรู พระองค์ทรงวางเท้าของข้าพระองค์ไว้ในที่กว้างขวาง
word.spanish1909: Y no me encerraste en mano del enemigo; Hiciste estar mis pies en anchura.
word.latinvulgate: Intellectum tibi dabo, et instruam te in via hac qua gradieris ; firmabo super te oculos meos.
word.italian1927: e non m’hai dato in man del nemico; tu m’hai messo i piedi al largo.
word.german1912: und übergibst mich nicht in die Hände des Feindes; du stellst meine Füße auf weiten Raum.
word.french1910: Et tu ne me livreras pas aux mains de l'ennemi, Tu mettras mes pieds au large.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你沒有把我交在仇敵的手裡，你使我的腳站穩在寬闊之地。
word.korean: 나를 대적의 수중에 금고치 아니하셨고 내 발을 넓은 곳에 세우셨음이니이다
word.tagalog: At hindi mo kinulong sa kamay ng kaaway; iyong inilagay ang aking mga paa sa maluwag na dako.
word.maori: Kahore ahau i kopia e koe ki roto ki te ringa o te hoariri: kua whakaturia e koe oku waewae ki te wahi nui.
word.cebuano: Ug wala mo ako palukbi sa kamot sa kaaway; Gipahamutang mo ang akong mga tiil sa kinalapdan.
word.hebrew: ח  אגילה ואשמחה    בחסדך אשר ראית את-עניי    ידעת בצרות נפשי
word.hebrewmodern: ולא הסגרתני ביד אויב העמדת במרחב רגלי׃
word.greekot: συνετιῶ σε καὶ συμβιβῶ σε ἐν ὁδῷ ταύτῃ ᾗ πορεύσῃ ἐπιστηριῶ ἐπὶ σὲ τοὺς ὀφθαλμούς μου

word.kjv: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงฉุดข้าพเจ้าขึ้นมาจากหลุมอันน่าสลด ออกมาจากเลนตม แล้ววางเท้าของข้าพเจ้าลงบนศิลา กระทำให้ย่างเท้าของข้าพเจ้ามั่นคง
word.spanish1909: E hízome sacar de un lago de miseria, del lodo cenagoso; Y puso mis pies sobre peña, y enderezó mis pasos.
word.latinvulgate: Beatus qui intelligit super egenum et pauperem : in die mala liberabit eum Dominus.
word.italian1927: Egli m’ha tratto fuori da una fossa di perdizione, dal pantano fangoso; ha fatto posare i miei piedi sulla roccia, ed ha stabilito i miei passi.
word.german1912: und zog mich aus der grausamen Grube und aus dem Schlamm und stellte meine Füße auf einen Fels, daß ich gewiß treten kann;
word.french1910: Il m'a retiré de la fosse de destruction, Du fond de la boue; Et il a dressé mes pieds sur le roc, Il a affermi mes pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他把我從荒蕪的坑裡，從泥沼中拉上來；他使我的腳站在磐石上，又使我的腳步穩定。
word.korean: 나를 기가 막힐 웅덩이와 수렁에서 끌어 올리시고 내 발을 반석위에 두사 내 걸음을 견고케 하셨도다
word.tagalog: Isinampa naman niya ako mula sa isang kakilakilabot na balon, mula sa balahong malagkit; at itinuntong niya ang aking mga paa sa isang malaking bato, at itinatag ang aking mga paglakad.
word.maori: Na kei te tango ake ia i ahau i te poka whakamataku, i te paru taoruoru; kei te whakatu i oku waewae ki runga ki te kohatu, kei te whakau i oku hikoinga.
word.cebuano: Siya nagkuha usab kanako gikan sa usa ka makalilisang nga gahong, gikan sa lapokon nga yanang. Ug gipahamutang niya ang akong mga tiil sa ibabaw sa bato, ug gitanos niya ang akong mga lakang.
word.hebrew: ב  קוה קויתי יהוה    ויט אלי וישמע שועתי
word.hebrewmodern: ויעלני מבור שאון מטיט היון ויקם על סלע רגלי כונן אשרי׃
word.greekot: μακάριος ὁ συνίων ἐπὶ πτωχὸν καὶ πένητα ἐν ἡμέρᾳ πονηρᾷ ῥύσεται αὐτὸν ὁ κύριος

word.kjv: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงปราบปรามชนชาติทั้งหลายให้อยู่ภายใต้เรา และชาวประเทศทั้งหลายให้อยู่ภายใต้เท้าของเรา
word.spanish1909: El sujetará á los pueblos debajo de nosotros, Y á las gentes debajo de nuestros pies.
word.latinvulgate: Fundatur exsultatione universæ terræ mons Sion ; latera aquilonis, civitas regis magni.
word.italian1927: Egli riduce i popoli sotto di noi, e le nazioni sotto i nostri piedi.
word.german1912: Er zwingt die Völker unter uns und die Leute unter unsre Füße.
word.french1910: Il nous assujettit des peuples, Il met des nations sous nos pieds;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他要使萬民臣服在我們之下，使列國臣服在我們的腳下。
word.korean: 여호와께서 만민을 우리에게 열방을 우리 발아래 복종케하시며
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pasusukuin ang mga bayan sa ilalim natin, at ang mga bansa sa ilalim ng ating mga paa.
word.maori: Mana e riro ai nga iwi ki raro i a tatou, me nga tautangata ki raro ki o tatou waewae.
word.cebuano: Gidaug niya ang mga katawohan sa ilalum nato, Ug ang mga nasud sa ilalum sa atong mga tiil.
word.hebrew: ג  כי-יהוה עליון נורא    מלך גדול על-כל-הארץ
word.hebrewmodern: ידבר עמים תחתינו ולאמים תחת רגלינו׃
word.greekot: εὖ ῥιζῶν ἀγαλλιάματι πάσης τῆς γῆς ὄρη σιων τὰ πλευρὰ τοῦ βορρᾶ ἡ πόλις τοῦ βασιλέως τοῦ μεγάλου

word.kjv: For thou hast delivered my soul from death: wilt not thou deliver my feet from falling, that I may walk before God in the light of the living?
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงช่วยจิตวิญญาณของข้าพระองค์ให้พ้นจากมัจจุราช พระองค์จะทรงช่วยเท้าของข้าพระองค์ให้พ้นจากการล้มมิใช่หรือ เพื่อข้าพระองค์จะดำเนินอยู่ต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระเจ้าในความสว่างแห่งชีวิต
word.spanish1909: Porque has librado mi vida de la muerte, Y mis pies de caída, Para que ande delante de Dios En la luz de los que viven.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: poiché tu hai riscosso l’anima mia dalla morte, hai guardato i miei piedi da caduta, ond’io cammini, al cospetto di Dio, nella luce de’ viventi.
word.german1912: denn du hast meine Seele vom Tode errettet, meine Füße vom Gleiten, daß ich wandle vor Gott im Licht der Lebendigen.
word.french1910: Car tu as délivré mon âme de la mort, Tu as garanti mes pieds de la chute, Afin que je marche devant Dieu, à la lumière des vivants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你救了我的性命脫離死亡；你不是救了我的腳不跌倒，使我在生命的光中，行在　神你的面前嗎？
word.korean: 주께서 내 생명을 사망에서 건지셨음이라 주께서 나로 하나님앞 생명의 빛에 다니게 하시려고 실족지 않게 하지 아니하셨나이까 ?
word.tagalog: Sapagka't iniligtas mo ang aking kaluluwa sa kamatayan: hindi mo ba iniligtas ang aking mga paa sa pagkahulog? upang ako'y makalakad sa harap ng Dios sa liwanag ng buhay.
word.maori: Nau hoki toku wairua i whakaora kei mata: e kore ianei koe e whakau i oku waewae kei paheke, kia haere ai ahau i te aroaro o te Atua i roto i te marama o te hunga ora.
word.cebuano: Kay giluwas mo ang akong kalag gikan sa kamatayon; Wala mo ba luwasa ang akong mga tiil gikan sa pagkahulog, Aron ako magalakaw sa atubangan sa Dios Diha sa kahayag sa mga buhi?
word.hebrew: יג  עלי אלהים נדריך    אשלם תודת לך [ (Psalms 56:14) יד  כי הצלת נפשי ממות--    הלא רגלי מדחי להתהלך לפני אלהים--    באור החיים ]
word.hebrewmodern: כי הצלת נפשי ממות הלא רגלי מדחי להתהלך לפני אלהים באור החיים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.
word.thailand: คนชอบธรรมจะเปรมปรีดิ์ เมื่อเขาเห็นการแก้แค้น เขาจะเอาโลหิตของคนชั่วล้างเท้าของเขา
word.spanish1909: Alegraráse el justo cuando viere la venganza: Sus pies lavará en la sangre del impío.
word.latinvulgate: Fortitudinem meam ad te custodiam, quia, Deus, susceptor meus es.
word.italian1927: Il giusto si rallegrerà quando avrà visto la vendetta; si laverà i piedi nel sangue dell’empio;
word.german1912: Der Gerechte wird sich freuen, wenn er solche Rache sieht, und wird seine Füße baden in des Gottlosen Blut,
word.french1910: Le juste sera dans la joie, à la vue de la vengeance; Il baignera ses pieds dans le sang des méchants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人看見仇敵遭報就歡喜；他要在惡人的血中洗自己的腳。
word.korean: 의인은 악인의 보복 당함을 보고 기뻐함이여 그 발을 악인의 피에 씻으리로다
word.tagalog: Magagalak ang matuwid pagka nakita niya ang higanti: kaniyang huhugasan ang kaniyang mga paa sa dugo ng masama.
word.maori: Ka hari te tangata tika ua kite i te utu: ka horoia e ia ona waewae ki nga toto o te tangata hara.
word.cebuano: Ang matarung magakalipay sa diha nga makita niya ang panimalus: Manghimitiis siya sa iyang mga tiil sa dugo sa mga dautan;
word.hebrew: י  בטרם יבינו סירתכם אטד    כמו-חי כמו-חרון ישערנו
word.hebrewmodern: ישמח צדיק כי חזה נקם פעמיו ירחץ בדם הרשע׃
word.greekot: τὸ κράτος μου πρὸς σὲ φυλάξω ὅτι ὁ θεὸς ἀντιλήμπτωρ μου εἶ

word.kjv: Which holdeth our soul in life, and suffereth not our feet to be moved.
word.thailand: ผู้ทรงให้จิตวิญญาณเราอยู่ท่ามกลางคนเป็น และมิได้ทรงยอมให้เท้าเราพลาด
word.spanish1909: El es el que puso nuestra alma en vida, Y no permitió que nuestros pies resbalasen.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Egli ha conservato in vita l’anima nostra, non ha permesso che il nostro piè vacillasse.
word.german1912: der unsre Seelen im Leben erhält und läßt unsre Füße nicht gleiten.
word.french1910: Il a conservé la vie à notre âme, Et il n'a pas permis que notre pied chancelât.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他保全我們的性命，不使我們的腳動搖。
word.korean: 그는 우리 영혼을 살려 두시고 우리의 실족함을 허락지 아니하시는 주시로다
word.tagalog: Na umaalalay sa ating kaluluwa sa buhay, at hindi tumitiis na makilos ang ating mga paa.
word.maori: Nana nei hoki i mau ai to tatou wairua ki te ora, kahore hoki e tukua e ia o tatou waewae kia nekehia.
word.cebuano: Siya mao ang nagakupot sa kinabuhi sa atong kalag, Ug dili motugot nga ang atong mga tiil matarug.
word.hebrew: ט  השם נפשנו בחיים    ולא-נתן למוט רגלנו
word.hebrewmodern: השם נפשנו בחיים ולא נתן למוט רגלנו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But as for me, my feet were almost gone; my steps had well nigh slipped.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพเจ้าเล่า เท้าของข้าพเจ้าเกือบสะดุด ย่างเท้าของข้าพเจ้าหมิ่นพลาดเต็มทีแล้ว
word.spanish1909: Mas yo, casi se deslizaron mis pies; Por poco resbalaron mis pasos.
word.latinvulgate: Memor esto congregationis tuæ, quam possedisti ab initio. Redemisti virgam hæreditatis tuæ, mons Sion, in quo habitasti in eo.
word.italian1927: Ma, quant’è a me, quasi inciamparono i miei piedi; poco mancò che i miei passi non sdrucciolassero.
word.german1912: Ich aber hätte schier gestrauchelt mit meinen Füßen; mein Tritt wäre beinahe geglitten.
word.french1910: Toutefois, mon pied allait fléchir, Mes pas étaient sur le point de glisser;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於我，我的腳幾乎滑跌，我（“我”原文作“我的腳步”）險些跌倒。
word.korean: 나는 거의 실족할 뻔 하였고 내 걸음이 미끄러질 뻔 하였으니
word.tagalog: Nguni't tungkol sa akin, ang mga paa ko'y halos nahiwalay: ang mga hakbang ko'y kamunti nang nangadulas.
word.maori: Ko ahau ia, wahi iti kua tapepa oku waewae: me i kotahi kua paheke oku takahanga.
word.cebuano: Apan alang kanako, daw mahidalinas na ang akong mga tiil; Diriyut na mahiligas ang akong mga lakang.
word.hebrew: ב  ואני--כמעט נטוי (נטיו) רגלי    כאין שפכה (שפכו) אשרי
word.hebrewmodern: ואני כמעט נטוי רגלי כאין שפכה אשרי׃
word.greekot: μνήσθητι τῆς συναγωγῆς σου ἧς ἐκτήσω ἀπ' ἀρχῆς ἐλυτρώσω ῥάβδον κληρονομίας σου ὄρος σιων τοῦτο ὃ κατεσκήνωσας ἐν αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Lift up thy feet unto the perpetual desolations; even all that the enemy hath done wickedly in the sanctuary.
word.thailand: ขอทรงนำย่างพระบาทของพระองค์มายังซากปรักหักพังอยู่เนืองนิตย์ คือมายังสิ่งทั้งปวงที่ถูกศัตรูกระทำอย่างชั่วร้ายในสถานบริสุทธิ์นั้น
word.spanish1909: Levanta tus pies á los asolamientos eternos: A todo enemigo que ha hecho mal en el santuario.
word.latinvulgate: Cum accepero tempus, ego justitias judicabo.
word.italian1927: Dirigi i tuoi passi verso le ruine perpetue; il nemico ha tutto devastato nel tuo santuario.
word.german1912: Hebe deine Schritte zum dem, was so lange wüst liegt. Der Feind hat alles verderbt im Heiligtum.
word.french1910: Porte tes pas vers ces lieux constamment dévastés! L'ennemi a tout ravagé dans le sanctuaire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你舉步去看那些長久荒涼的地方，去看仇敵在聖所裡所行的一切惡事。
word.korean: 영구히 파멸된 곳으로 주의 발을 드십소서 원수가 성소에서 모든 악을 행하였나이다
word.tagalog: Itaas mo ang iyong mga paa sa mga walang hanggang guho, ang lahat na kasamaang ginawa ng kaaway sa santuario.
word.maori: Hiki ake ou waewae ki nga whakangaromanga e mau tonu nei, ki nga mahi kino katoa a te hoariri ki te wahi tapu.
word.cebuano: Sakwata ang imong mga tiil ngadto sa mga pagkalaglag nga walay katapusan, Sa tanang mga kadautan nga gibuhat sa kaaway didto sa balaang puloy-anan.
word.hebrew: ג  הרימה פעמיך למשאות נצח    כל-הרע אויב בקדש
word.hebrewmodern: הרימה פעמיך למשאות נצח כל הרע אויב בקדש׃
word.greekot: διηγήσομαι πάντα τὰ θαυμάσιά σου ὅταν λάβω καιρόν ἐγὼ εὐθύτητας κρινῶ

word.kjv: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.
word.thailand: ท่านจะเหยียบสิงโตและงูเห่า ท่านจะย่ำสิงโตหนุ่มและมังกร
word.spanish1909: Sobre el león y el basilisco pisarás; Hollarás al cachorro del león y al dragón.
word.latinvulgate: Justus ut palma florebit ; sicut cedrus Libani multiplicabitur.
word.italian1927: Tu camminerai sul leone e sull’aspide, calpesterai il leoncello e il serpente.
word.german1912: Auf Löwen und Ottern wirst du gehen, und treten auf junge Löwen und Drachen.
word.french1910: Tu marcheras sur le lion et sur l'aspic, Tu fouleras le lionceau et le dragon.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你必踐踏獅子和虺蛇。你必踏碎少壯獅子和大蛇。
word.korean: 네가 사자와 독사를 밟으며 젊은 사자와 뱀을 발로 누르리로다
word.tagalog: Iyong yayapakan ang leon at ang ulupong: ang batang leon at ang ahas ay yuyurakan mo ng iyong mga paa.
word.maori: Ka haere koe i runga i te raiona, i te neke: ka takahia e koe ki raro te kuao raiona me te nakahi.
word.cebuano: Ikaw magatunob sa ibabaw sa leon, ug sa sawa nga malala: Pagayatakan mo ang gagmay nga leon ug ang halas.
word.hebrew: יג  על-שחל ופתן תדרך    תרמס כפיר ותנין
word.hebrewmodern: על שחל ופתן תדרך תרמס כפיר ותנין׃
word.greekot: δίκαιος ὡς φοῖνιξ ἀνθήσει ὡσεὶ κέδρος ἡ ἐν τῷ λιβάνῳ πληθυνθήσεται

word.kjv: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:
word.thailand: เท้าของเขาเจ็บช้ำด้วยตรวน ตัวเขาเข้าอยู่ในปลอกเหล็ก
word.spanish1909: Afligieron sus pies con grillos; En hierro fué puesta su persona.
word.latinvulgate: Et exarsit ignis in synagoga eorum, flamma combussit peccatores.
word.italian1927: I suoi piedi furon serrati nei ceppi, ei fu messo in catene di ferro,
word.german1912: Sie zwangen seine Füße in den Stock, sein Leib mußte in Eisen liegen,
word.french1910: On serra ses pieds dans des liens, On le mit aux fers,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人用腳鐐弄傷他的腳，他的頸項被鐵鍊鎖著，
word.korean: 그 발이 착고에 상하며 그 몸이 쇠사슬에 매였으니
word.tagalog: Ang kaniyang mga paa ay sinaktan nila ng mga pangpangaw; siya'y nalagay sa mga tanikalang bakal:
word.maori: I whakamamaetia ona waewae ki te mekameka: takoto ana ia i te rino;
word.cebuano: Gipasakitan nila ang iyang mga tiil sa mga sepo nga puthaw: Siya gibutang nila sa talikala nga puthaw,
word.hebrew: יח  ענו בכבל רגליו (רגלו)    ברזל באה נפשו
word.hebrewmodern: ענו בכבל רגליו ברזל באה נפשו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐξεκαύθη πῦρ ἐν τῇ συναγωγῇ αὐτῶν φλὸξ κατέφλεξεν ἁμαρτωλούς

word.kjv: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.
word.thailand: มีมือ แต่คลำไม่ได้ มีเท้า แต่เดินไม่ได้ รูปเหล่านั้นทำเสียงในคอไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Manos tienen, mas no palparán; Tienen pies, mas no andarán; No hablarán con su garganta.
word.latinvulgate: O Domine, quia ego servus tuus ; ego servus tuus, et filius ancillæ tuæ. Dirupisti vincula mea :
word.italian1927: hanno mani e non toccano, hanno piedi e non camminano, la loro gola non rende alcun suono.
word.german1912: sie haben Hände, und greifen nicht; Füße haben sie, und gehen nicht; sie reden nicht durch ihren Hals.
word.french1910: Elles ont des mains et ne touchent point, Des pieds et ne marchent point, Elles ne produisent aucun son dans leur gosier.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 有手，卻不能摸；有腳，卻不能行；也不能用喉嚨發聲。
word.korean: 손이 있어도 만지지 못하며 발이 있어도 걷지 못하며 목구멍으로 소리도 못하느니라
word.tagalog: Mayroon silang mga kamay, nguni't hindi sila nangakatatangan; mga paa ay mayroon sila, nguni't hindi sila nangakalalakad; ni nangagsasalita man sila sa kanilang ngalangala.
word.maori: He ringa o ratou, a kahore e whawha: he waewae o ratou, a kahore e haere: kahore hoki o ratou korokoro e korero.
word.cebuano: Sila adunay mga kamot, apan sila dili makahikap; Sila adunay mga tiil, apan sila dili makalakaw; Ni makasulti sila pinaagi sa ilang totonlan.
word.hebrew: ז  ידיהם ולא ימישון--רגליהם ולא יהלכו    לא-יהגו בגרונם
word.hebrewmodern: ידיהם ולא ימישון רגליהם ולא יהלכו לא יהגו בגרונם׃
word.greekot: σοὶ θύσω θυσίαν αἰνέσεως

word.kjv: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงช่วยจิตใจข้าพระองค์ให้พ้นจากมัจจุราช ช่วยนัยน์ตาข้าพระองค์จากน้ำตา ช่วยเท้าข้าพระองค์จากการล้ม
word.spanish1909: Pues tú has librado mi alma de la muerte, Mis ojos de lágrimas, Y mis pies de desbarrar.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Poiché tu hai liberata l’anima mia dalla morte, gli occhi miei da lacrime, i miei piedi da caduta.
word.german1912: Denn du hast meine Seele aus dem Tode gerissen, meine Augen von den Tränen, meinen Fuß vom Gleiten.
word.french1910: Oui, tu as délivré mon âme de la mort, Mes yeux des larmes, Mes pieds de la chute.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主啊！你救了我的性命脫離死亡，你使我的眼睛不致流淚，使我的雙腳不致跌倒。
word.korean: 주께서 내 영혼을 사망에서, 내 눈을 눈물에서, 내 발을 넘어짐에서 건지셨나이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't iyong iniligtas ang kaluluwa ko sa kamatayan, at ang mga mata ko sa mga luha, at ang mga paa ko sa pagkabuwal.
word.maori: Nau hoki toku wairua i whakaora kei mate, oku kanohi kei whai roimata, oku waewae kei paheke.
word.cebuano: Kay imong giluwas ang akong kalag gikan sa kamatayon, Ang akong mga mata gikan sa mga luha, Ug ang akong mga tiil gikan sa pagkahidalin-as.
word.hebrew: ח  כי חלצת נפשי ממות    את-עיני מן-דמעה את-רגלי מדחי
word.hebrewmodern: כי חלצת נפשי ממות את עיני מן דמעה את רגלי מדחי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์คิดถึงทางทั้งหลายของข้าพระองค์ แล้วข้าพระองค์หันเท้าของข้าพระองค์ไปสู่บรรดาพระโอวาทของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Consideré mis caminos, Y torné mis pies á tus testimonios.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io ho riflettuto alle mie vie e ho rivolto i miei passi verso le tue testimonianze.
word.german1912: Ich betrachte meine Wege und kehre meine Füße zu deinen Zeugnissen.
word.french1910: Je réfléchis à mes voies, Et je dirige mes pieds vers tes préceptes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我思想我所行的道路，就轉回腳步歸向你的法度。
word.korean: 주의 의는 영원한 의요 주의 법은 진리로소이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y nagiisip sa aking mga lakad, at ibinalik ko ang aking mga paa sa iyong mga patotoo.
word.maori: ¶ I whakaaro ahau ki oku ara: a anga ana oku waewae ki au whakaaturanga.
word.cebuano: Gipalandong ko ang akong mga dalan, Ug gipabalik ko ang akong mga tiil ngadto sa imong mga pagpamatuod.
word.hebrew: נט  חשבתי דרכי    ואשיבה רגלי אל-עדתיך
word.hebrewmodern: חשבתי דרכי ואשיבה רגלי אל עדתיך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์รั้งเท้าข้าพระองค์ไว้จากวิถีชั่วทุกอย่าง เพื่อรักษาพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: De todo mal camino contuve mis pies, Para guardar tu palabra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io ho trattenuto i miei piedi da ogni sentiero malvagio, per osservare la tua parola.
word.german1912: Ich wehre meinem Fuß alle bösen Wege, daß ich dein Wort halte.
word.french1910: Je retiens mon pied loin de tout mauvais chemin, Afin de garder ta parole.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我制止我的腳不走任何邪惡的路，為要謹守你的話。
word.korean: 주의 증거는 나의 즐거움이요 나의 모사니이다
word.tagalog: Aking pinigil ang mga paa ko sa lahat ng masamang lakad, upang aking masunod ang salita mo.
word.maori: ¶ Kua kaiponuhia mai e ahau oku waewae i nga ara kino katoa, kia pupuri ai ahau i tau kupu.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa tanang mga dalan nga dautan, gipunggan ko ang akong mga tiil, Aron nga ako makatuman sa imong pulong.
word.hebrew: קא  מכל-ארח רע כלאתי רגלי--    למען אשמר דברך
word.hebrewmodern: מכל ארח רע כלאתי רגלי למען אשמר דברך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
word.thailand: พระวจนะของพระองค์เป็นโคมสำหรับเท้าของข้าพระองค์ และเป็นความสว่างแก่มรรคาของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: NUN. Lámpara es á mis pies tu palabra, Y lumbrera á mi camino.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: La tua parola è una lampada al mio piè ed una luce sul mio sentiero.
word.german1912: Dein Wort ist meine Fußes Leuchte und ein Licht auf meinem Wege.
word.french1910: Ta parole est une lampe à mes pieds, Et une lumière sur mon sentier.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 立誓專心遵行　神律例你的話是我腳前的燈，是我路上的光。
word.korean: 나의 영혼이 눌림을 인하여 녹사오니 주의 말씀대로 나를 세우소서
word.tagalog: Ang salita mo'y ilawan sa aking mga paa, at liwanag sa aking landas.
word.maori: ¶ He rama tau kupu ki oku waewae, he marama ki toku ara.
word.cebuano: Ang imong pulong maoy lamparahan sa akong mga tiil, Ug kahayag sa akong alagianan.
word.hebrew: קה  נר-לרגלי דברך    ואור לנתיבתי
word.hebrewmodern: נר לרגלי דברך ואור לנתיבתי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
word.thailand: เยรูซาเล็มเอ๋ย เท้าของพวกข้าพเจ้าจะยืนอยู่ภายในประตูกำแพงของเธอ
word.spanish1909: Nuestros pies estuvieron En tus puertas, oh Jerusalem;
word.latinvulgate: Ecce sicut oculi servorum in manibus dominorum suorum ; sicut oculi ancillæ in manibus dominæ suæ : ita oculi nostri ad Dominum Deum nostrum, donec misereatur nostri.
word.italian1927: I nostri passi si son fermati entro le tue porte, o Gerusalemme;
word.german1912: Unsre Füße stehen in deinen Toren, Jerusalem.
word.french1910: Nos pieds s'arrêtent Dans tes portes, Jérusalem!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶路撒冷啊！我們的腳正站在你的門內。
word.korean: 예루살렘아 ! 우리 발이 네 성문 안에 섰도다
word.tagalog: Ang mga paa natin ay nagsisitayo sa loob ng iyong mga pintuang-bayan, Oh Jerusalem;
word.maori: E tu ana o matou waewae ki ou tatau, e Hiruharama:
word.cebuano: Ang among mga tiil nanagtindog Sa sulod sa imong mga ganghaan, Oh Jerusalem,
word.hebrew: ב  עמדות היו רגלינו--    בשעריך ירושלם
word.hebrewmodern: עמדות היו רגלינו בשעריך ירושלם׃
word.greekot: ἰδοὺ ὡς ὀφθαλμοὶ δούλων εἰς χεῖρας τῶν κυρίων αὐτῶν ὡς ὀφθαλμοὶ παιδίσκης εἰς χεῖρας τῆς κυρίας αὐτῆς οὕτως οἱ ὀφθαλμοὶ ἡμῶν πρὸς κύριον τὸν θεὸν ἡμῶν ἕως οὗ οἰκτιρήσαι ἡμᾶς

word.kjv: For their feet run to evil, and make haste to shed blood.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าเท้าของเขาวิ่งไปหาความชั่วร้าย และเขารีบเร่งไปทำให้โลหิตตก
word.spanish1909: Porque sus pies correrán al mal, E irán presurosos á derramar sangre.
word.latinvulgate: pedes enim illorum ad malum currunt, et festinant ut effundant sanguinem.
word.italian1927: poiché i loro piedi corrono al male ed essi s’affrettano a spargere il sangue.
word.german1912: Denn ihr Füße laufen zum Bösen und eilen, Blut zu vergießen.
word.french1910: Car leurs pieds courent au mal, Et ils ont hâte de répandre le sang.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他們的腳奔向邪惡，他們急於流人的血。
word.korean: 내 아들아 그들과 함께 길에 다니지 말라 네 발을 금하여 그 길을 밟지 말라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang kanilang mga paa ay nagsisitakbo sa kasamaan, at sila'y nangagmamadali sa pagbububo ng dugo.
word.maori: E rere ana hoki o ratou waewae ki te kino, e hohoro ana ratou ki te whakaheke toto.
word.cebuano: Kay ang ilang mga tiil nanagdalagan ngadto sa kadautan, Ug sila nanagdali aron sa pag-ula ug dugo.
word.hebrew: טז  כי רגליהם לרע ירוצו    וימהרו לשפך-דם
word.hebrewmodern: כי רגליהם לרע ירוצו וימהרו לשפך דם׃
word.greekot: οἱ γὰρ πόδες αὐτῶν εἰς κακίαν τρέχουσιν καὶ ταχινοὶ τοῦ ἐκχέαι αἷμα

word.kjv: Ponder the path of thy feet, and let all thy ways be established.
word.thailand: จงพิจารณาวิถีแห่งเท้าของเจ้า แล้วทางทั้งสิ้นของเจ้าจะมั่นคง
word.spanish1909: Examina la senda de tus pies, Y todos tus caminos sean ordenados.
word.latinvulgate: Dirige semitam pedibus tuis, et omnes viæ tuæ stabilientur.
word.italian1927: Appiana il sentiero dei tuoi piedi, e tutte le tue vie siano ben preparate.
word.german1912: Laß deinen Fuß gleich vor sich gehen, so gehst du gewiß.
word.french1910: Considère le chemin par où tu passes, Et que toutes tes voies soient bien réglées;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要謹慎你腳下的路徑，你一切所行的就必穩妥。
word.korean: 네 발의 행할 첩경을 평탄케 하며 네 모든 길을 든든히 하라
word.tagalog: Papanatagin mo ang landas ng iyong mga paa, at mangatatag ang lahat ng iyong lakad.
word.maori: Whakatikaia te huarahi o ou waewae, kia u ano hoki ou ara katoa.
word.cebuano: Pataga ang alagianan sa imong mga tiil, Ug tukora sa matul-id gayud ang tanan mong mga dalan.
word.hebrew: כו  פלס מעגל רגלך    וכל-דרכיך יכנו
word.hebrewmodern: פלס מעגל רגלך וכל דרכיך יכנו׃
word.greekot: αὐτὸς δὲ ὀρθὰς ποιήσει τὰς τροχιάς σου τὰς δὲ πορείας σου ἐν εἰρήνῃ προάξει

word.kjv: Her feet go down to death; her steps take hold on hell.
word.thailand: เท้าของนางก้าวลงไปสู่ความตาย ย่างเท้าของนางติดตามวิถีสู่นรก
word.spanish1909: Sus pies descienden á la muerte; Sus pasos sustentan el sepulcro:
word.latinvulgate: Pedes ejus descendunt in mortem, et ad inferos gressus illius penetrant.
word.italian1927: I suoi piedi scendono alla morte, i suoi passi fan capo al soggiorno dei defunti.
word.german1912: Ihre Füße laufen zum Tod hinunter; ihre Gänge führen ins Grab.

word.french1910: Heureux vous qui partout semez le long des eaux, Et qui laissez sans entraves le pied du boeuf et de l'âne!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們這些在各水邊撒種，又使牛驢隨意走動的，是多麼有福啊！
word.tagalog: Mapapalad kayo na nangaghahasik sa siping ng lahat na tubig, na nangagpapalakad ng mga paa ng baka at ng asno.
word.maori: Ano te hari o koutou, o te hunga e whakato ana ki te taha o nga wai katoa, e tuku atu ana i nga waewae o te kau, o te kaihe.
word.cebuano: Bulahan kamo nga nanagpugas sa daplin sa tanan nga mga tubig, nga nanagpalakaw sa mga tiil sa vaca ug asno.
word.hebrew: כ אשריכם זרעי על כל מים משלחי רגל השור והחמור  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: אשריכם זרעי על כל מים משלחי רגל השור והחמור׃
word.greekot: μακάριοι οἱ σπείροντες ἐπὶ πᾶν ὕδωρ οὗ βοῦς καὶ ὄνος πατεῖ

word.kjv: I have digged, and drunk water; and with the sole of my feet have I dried up all the rivers of the besieged places.
word.thailand: ข้าขุดบ่อและดื่มน้ำ ข้าได้เอาฝ่าเท้าของข้ากวาดธารน้ำทั้งสิ้นของสถานที่ที่ถูกล้อมโจมตีให้แห้งไป"
word.spanish1909: Yo cavé, y bebí las aguas; y con las pisadas de mis pies secaré todos los ríos de lugares atrincherados.
word.latinvulgate: Ego fodi, et bibi aquam, et exsiccavi vestigio pedis mei omnes rivos aggerum.
word.italian1927: Io ho scavato, e bevuto dell’acqua; con la pianta dei mie piedi prosciugherò tutti i fiumi d’Egitto".
word.german1912: Ich habe gegraben und getrunken die Wasser und werde mit meinen Fußsohlen austrocknen alle Flüsse Ägyptens."
word.french1910: J'ai ouvert des sources, et j'en ai bu les eaux, Et je tarirai avec la plante de mes pieds Tous les fleuves de l'Egypte.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我挖井和喝水；我用我的腳掌踏乾埃及的河流。’
word.korean: 네가 어찌 듣지 못하였겠느냐 ? 이 일들은 내가 태초부터 행한 바요 상고부터 정한 바로서 이제 내가 이루어 너로 견고한 성을 헐어 돌무더기가 되게 하였노라
word.tagalog: Ako'y humukay at uminom ng tubig, at aking tutuyuin ng talampakan ng aking mga paa ang lahat ng mga ilog ng Egipto.
word.maori: Keria ana e ahau, inu wai ana ahau, maroke ake i te kapu o toku waewae nga awa katoa o Ihipa.
word.cebuano: Ako nakakalot ug nakainum ug tubig, ug sa lapalapa sa akong mga tiil pagamal-on ko ang tanang mga suba sa Egipto.
word.hebrew: כה אני קרתי ושתיתי מים ואחרב בכף פעמי כל יארי מצור
word.hebrewmodern: אני קרתי ושתיתי מים ואחרב בכף פעמי כל יארי מצור׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἔθηκα γέφυραν καὶ ἠρήμωσα ὕδατα καὶ πᾶσαν συναγωγὴν ὕδατος

word.kjv: He pursued them, and passed safely; even by the way that he had not gone with his feet.
word.thailand: ท่านไล่ตามพวกเขาและผ่านเขาไปอย่างปลอดภัย ตามทางที่เท้าของท่านไม่เคยเหยียบ
word.spanish1909: Siguiólos, pasó en paz por camino por donde sus pies nunca habían entrado.
word.latinvulgate: Persequetur eos, transibit in pace, semita in pedibus ejus non apparebit.
word.italian1927: Ei li insegue, e passa in trionfo per una via che i suoi piedi non hanno mai calcato.
word.german1912: daß er ihnen nachjagte und zog durch mit Frieden und ward des Wegs noch nie müde?
word.french1910: Il s'est mis à leur poursuite, il a parcouru avec bonheur Un chemin que son pied n'avait jamais foulé.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他追趕他們，安然走過他的腳未曾走過的路。
word.korean: 그가 그들을 쫓아서 그 발로 가 보지 못한 길을 안전히 지났나니
word.tagalog: Kaniyang hinahabol sila, at nagpatuloy na tiwasay, sa makatuwid baga'y sa daan na hindi niya dinaanan ng kaniyang mga paa.
word.maori: Whaia ana ratou e ia, haere ora atu ana ia; ae ra, i te ara kihai i haerea e ona waewae.
word.cebuano: Siya nagagukod kanila, ug milabay sa walay kabilinggan, bisan pa sa usa ka dalan nga wala hitaaki sa iyang mga tiil.
word.hebrew: ג ירדפם יעבור שלום ארח ברגליו לא יבוא
word.hebrewmodern: ירדפם יעבור שלום ארח ברגליו לא יבוא׃
word.greekot: καὶ διώξεται αὐτοὺς καὶ διελεύσεται ἐν εἰρήνῃ ἡ ὁδὸς τῶν ποδῶν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: And kings shall be thy nursing fathers, and their queens thy nursing mothers: they shall bow down to thee with their face toward the earth, and lick up the dust of thy feet; and thou shalt know that I am the LORD: for they shall not be ashamed that wait for me.
word.thailand: บรรดากษัตริย์จะเป็นพ่อเลี้ยงของเจ้า และพระราชินีทั้งหลายจะเป็นแม่เลี้ยงของเจ้า เขาเหล่านั้นจะก้มหน้าลงถึงดินกราบเจ้า เขาจะเลียผงคลีที่เท้าของเจ้า แล้วเจ้าจะรู้ว่าเราคือพระเยโฮวาห์ ผู้ที่รอคอยเราจะไม่ประสบความอาย"
word.spanish1909: Y reyes serán tus ayos, y sus reinas tus amas de leche; el rostro inclinado á tierra te adorarán, y lamerán el polvo de tus pies: y conocerás que yo soy Jehová, que no se avergonzarán los que me esperan.
word.latinvulgate: Et erunt reges nutritii tui, et reginæ nutrices tuæ ; vultu in terram demisso adorabunt te, et pulverem pedum tuorum lingent. Et scies quia ego Dominus, super quo non confundentur qui exspectant eum.
word.italian1927: Dei re saranno tuoi balii, e le loro regine saranno tue balie; essi si prostreranno dinanzi a te con la faccia a terra, e leccheranno la polvere de’ tuoi piedi; e tu riconoscerai che io sono l’Eterno, e che coloro che sperano in me non saranno confusi.
word.german1912: Und Könige sollen deine Pfleger, und ihre Fürstinnen deine Säugammen sein; sie werden vor dir niederfallen zur Erde aufs Angesicht und deiner Füße Staub lecken. Da wirst du erfahren, daß ich der HERR bin, an welchem nicht zu Schanden werden, die auf mich harren.
word.french1910: Des rois seront tes nourriciers, et leurs princesses tes nourrices; Ils se prosterneront devant toi la face contre terre, Et ils lécheront la poussière de tes pieds, Et tu sauras que je suis l'Eternel, Et que ceux qui espèrent en moi ne seront point confus.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 列國的君王要作你的養父，他們的王后必作你的保姆；他們必臉伏於地向你下拜，舐你腳上的塵土。那麼，你就知道我是耶和華，那些仰望我的決不會羞愧。”
word.korean: 열왕은 네 양부가 되며 왕비들은 네 유모가 될 것이며 그들이 얼굴을 땅에 대고 네게 절하고 네 발의 티끌을 핥을 것이니 네가 나를 여호와인 줄 알리라 나를 바라는 자는 수치를 당하지 아니하리라
word.tagalog: At mga hari ang magiging iyong mga taga kandiling ama, at ang kanilang mga reina, ay iyong mga taga kandiling ina: sila'y magsisiyukod sa iyo ng kanilang mga mukha sa lupa, at hihimuran ang alabok ng inyong mga paa: at iyong makikilala, na ako ang Panginoon, at ang nangaghihintay sa akin ay hindi mangapapahiya.
word.maori: A hei matua atawhai mou nga kingi, ko a ratou kuini hoki hei kaiwhakangote mou: ka piko iho ratou ki a koe, tapapa rawa ki te whenua, ka mitimiti hoki i te puehu o ou waewae: a ka mohio koe ko Ihowa ahau; e kore hoki te hunga e tatari ana ki aha u e whakama.
word.cebuano: Ug ang mga hari mahimo nga imong mga maalimahong amahan, ug ang ilang mga reina nga imong mga iwaïduko nila kanimo ang ilang mga nawong hangtud sa yuta, ug tilapan ang abug sa imong mga tiil; ug ikaw masayud nga ako mao si Jehova; ug sila nga managhulat kanako dili pagapakaulawan.
word.hebrew: כג והיו מלכים אמניך ושרותיהם מיניקתיך--אפים ארץ ישתחוו לך ועפר רגליך ילחכו וידעת כי אני יהוה אשר לא יבשו קוי  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: והיו מלכים אמניך ושרותיהם מיניקתיך אפים ארץ ישתחוו לך ועפר רגליך ילחכו וידעת כי אני יהוה אשר לא יבשו קוי׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἔσονται βασιλεῖς τιθηνοί σου αἱ δὲ ἄρχουσαι τροφοί σου ἐπὶ πρόσωπον τῆς γῆς προσκυνήσουσίν σοι καὶ τὸν χοῦν τῶν ποδῶν σου λείξουσιν καὶ γνώσῃ ὅτι ἐγὼ κύριος καὶ οὐκ αἰσχυνθήσῃ

word.kjv: How beautiful upon the mountains are the feet of him that bringeth good tidings, that publisheth peace; that bringeth good tidings of good, that publisheth salvation; that saith unto Zion, Thy God reigneth!
word.thailand: เท้าของผู้ประกาศข่าวประเสริฐมา ก็งามสักเท่าใดที่บนภูเขา ผู้โฆษณาสันติภาพ ผู้ประกาศข่าวประเสริฐแห่งสิ่งอันประเสริฐ ผู้โฆษณาความรอด ผู้กล่าวแก่ศิโยนว่า "พระเจ้าของเจ้าทรงครอบครอง"
word.spanish1909: Cuán hermosos son sobre los montes los pies del que trae alegres nuevas, del que publica la paz, del que trae nuevas del bien, del que publica salud, del que dice á Sión: Tu Dios reina!
word.latinvulgate: Quam pulchri super montes pedes annuntiantis et prædicantis pacem, annuntiantis bonum, prædicantis salutem, dicentis Sion : Regnabit Deus tuus !
word.italian1927: Quanto son belli, sui monti, i piedi del messaggero di buone novelle, che annunzia la pace, ch’è araldo di notizie liete, che annunzia la salvezza, che dici a Sion: "Il tuo Dio regna!"
word.german1912: Wie lieblich sind auf den Bergen die Füße der Boten, die da Frieden verkündigen, Gutes predigen, Heil verkündigen, die da sagen zu Zion: Dein Gott ist König!
word.french1910: Qu'ils sont beaux sur les montagnes, Les pieds de celui qui apporte de bonnes nouvelles, Qui publie la paix! De celui qui apporte de bonnes nouvelles, Qui publie le salut! De celui qui dit à Sion: ton Dieu règne!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那傳福音、宣布平安、傳美好的福音、宣布救恩，又對錫安說“你的　神作王了”的，他的腳蹤在山上多麼的美！
word.korean: 좋은 소식을 가져오며 평화를 공포하며 복된 좋은 소식을 가져오며 구원을 공포하며 시온을 향하여 이르기를 네 하나님이 통치하신다 하는 자의 산을 넘는 발이 어찌 그리 아름다운고
word.tagalog: Anong pagkaganda sa mga bundok ng mga paa niyaong nagdadala ng mga mabuting balita, na naghahayag ng kapayapaan, na nangagdadala ng mga mabuting balita sa ikabubuti, na nagtatanyag ng kaligtasan, na nagsasabi sa Sion, Ang iyong Dios ay naghahari!
word.maori: ¶ Ano te ahuareka o nga waewae i runga i nga maunga o te kaikawe i te rongo pai, e kauwhau ana i te maunga rongo; e kawe mai ana i te rongo whakahari o te pai, e kauwhau ana i te ora; e mea ana ki a Hiona, E kingi ana tou Atua!
word.cebuano: Pagkatahum sa ibabaw sa kabukiran sa mga tiil niadtong nanagdala sa mga maayong balita, nga nanagmantala sa pakigdait, nga nanagdala ug mga maayong balita sa kaayohan, nga nanagmantala sa kaluwasan, nga nanag-ingon sa Sion: Ang imong Dios nagahari!
word.hebrew: ז מה נאוו על ההרים רגלי מבשר משמיע שלום מבשר טוב--משמיע ישועה אמר לציון מלך אלהיך
word.hebrewmodern: מה נאוו על ההרים רגלי מבשר משמיע שלום מבשר טוב משמיע ישועה אמר לציון מלך אלהיך׃
word.greekot: ὡς ὥρα ἐπὶ τῶν ὀρέων ὡς πόδες εὐαγγελιζομένου ἀκοὴν εἰρήνης ὡς εὐαγγελιζόμενος ἀγαθά ὅτι ἀκουστὴν ποιήσω τὴν σωτηρίαν σου λέγων σιων βασιλεύσει σου ὁ θεός

word.kjv: Their feet run to evil, and they make hast to shed innocent blood: their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity; wasting and destruction are in their paths.
word.thailand: เท้าของเขาวิ่งไปหาความชั่ว และเขาเร่งไปหลั่งโลหิตไร้ความผิดให้ถึงตาย ความคิดของเขาเป็นความคิดชั่วช้า การล้างผลาญและการทำลายอยู่ในหนทางของเขา
word.spanish1909: Sus pies corren al mal, y se apresuran para derramar la sangre inocente; sus pensamientos, pensamientos de iniquidad, destrucción y quebrantamiento en sus caminos.
word.latinvulgate: Pedes eorum ad malum currunt, et festinant ut effundant sanguinem innocentem ; cogitationes eorum cogitationes inutiles, vastitas et contritio in viis eorum.
word.italian1927: I loro piedi corrono al male, ed essi s’affrettano a spargere sangue innocente; i loro pensieri son pensieri d’iniquità, la desolazione e la ruina sono sulla loro strada.
word.german1912: Ihre Füße laufen zum Bösen, und sie sind schnell, unschuldig Blut zu vergießen; ihre Gedanken sind Unrecht, ihr Weg ist eitel Verderben und Schaden;
word.french1910: Leurs pieds courent au mal, Et ils ont hâte de répandre le sang innocent; Leurs pensées sont des pensées d'iniquité, Le ravage et la ruine sont sur leur route.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們的腳奔跑行惡，他們急於流無辜人的血；他們的思想都是邪惡的思想，他們的行徑全是破壞和毀滅。
word.korean: 그 발은 행악하기에 빠르고 무죄한 피를 흘리기에 신속하며 그 사상은 죄악의 사상이라 황폐와 파멸이 그 길에 끼쳐졌으며
word.tagalog: Tinatakbo ng kanilang mga paa ang kasamaan, at sila'y nangagmamadaling magbubo ng walang salang dugo: ang kanilang mga pagiisip ay mga pagiisip ng kasamaan; kawasakan at kagibaan ay nasa kanilang mga landas.
word.maori: E rere ana o ratou waewae i te kino, hohoro tonu hoki ratou ki te whakaheke i te toto harakore: ko o ratou whakaaro he whakaaro ki te kino, he whakamoti, he wawahi kei o ratou ara.
word.cebuano: Ang ilang mga tiil manalagan padulong sa kadautan, ug sila madali nga moula sa dugo nga inocente: ang ilang mga hunahuna mao ang mga hunahuna sa kasal-anan; kasub-anan; ug kalaglagan anaa sa ilang mga alagianan.
word.hebrew: ז רגליהם לרע ירצו וימהרו לשפך דם נקי מחשבותיהם מחשבות און--שד ושבר במסלותם
word.hebrewmodern: רגליהם לרע ירצו וימהרו לשפך דם נקי מחשבותיהם מחשבות און שד ושבר במסלותם׃
word.greekot: οἱ δὲ πόδες αὐτῶν ἐπὶ πονηρίαν τρέχουσιν ταχινοὶ ἐκχέαι αἷμα καὶ οἱ διαλογισμοὶ αὐτῶν διαλογισμοὶ ἀφρόνων σύντριμμα καὶ ταλαιπωρία ἐν ταῖς ὁδοῖς αὐτῶν

word.kjv: The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee, the fir tree, the pine tree, and the box together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.
word.thailand: สง่าราศีแห่งเลบานอนจะมายังเจ้า คือต้นสนสามใบ ต้นสนเขาและต้นช้องรำพันด้วยกัน เพื่อจะกระทำให้ที่แห่งสถานบริสุทธิ์ของเรางดงาม และเราจะกระทำให้ที่แห่งเท้าของเรารุ่งโรจน์
word.spanish1909: La gloria del Líbano vendrá á ti, hayas, pinos, y bojes juntamente, para decorar el lugar de mi santuario; y yo honraré el lugar de mis pies.
word.latinvulgate: Gloria Libani ad te veniet, abies, et buxus, et pinus simul ad ornandum locum sanctificationis meæ ; et locum pedum meorum glorificabo.
word.italian1927: La gloria del Libano verrà a te, il cipresso, il platano e il larice verranno assieme per ornare il luogo del mio santuario, ed io renderò glorioso il luogo ove posano i miei piedi.
word.german1912: Die Herrlichkeit des Libanon soll an dich kommen, Tannen, Buchen und Buchsbaum miteinander, zu schmücken den Ort meines Heiligtums; denn ich will die Stätte meiner Füße herrlich machen.
word.french1910: La gloire du Liban viendra chez toi, Le cyprès, l'orme et le buis, tous ensemble, Pour orner le lieu de mon sanctuaire, Et je glorifierai la place où reposent mes pieds.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 黎巴嫩的榮耀必來歸你，就是松樹、杉樹和黃楊樹，都一起歸你，為要裝飾我聖所之地，我也要使我踏足之處得榮耀。
word.korean: 레바논의 영광 곧 잣나무와 소나무와 황양목이 함께 네게 이르러 내 거룩한 곳을 아름답게 할 것이며 내가 나의 발 둘 곳을 영화롭게 할 것이라
word.tagalog: Ang kaluwalhatian ng Libano ay darating sa iyo, ang puno ng abeto, ng pino, at ng boj na magkakasama, upang pagandahin ang dako ng aking santuario; at aking gagawin ang dako ng aking mga paa na maluwalhati.
word.maori: Ka tae mai te kororia o Repanona ki a koe, te kauri, te rimu, me te ake ngatahi hei whakapaipai, mo te wahi i toku kainga tapu, a ka whakakororiatia e ahau te wahi o oku waewae.
word.cebuano: Ang himaya sa Libano modangat kanimo, ang mga kahoy nga haya, ang mga pino, ug ang mga boje nga nagtipon, aron sa pagpatahum sa dapit sa akong balaang puloy-anan; ug himoon ko ang dapit sa akong mga tiil nga mahimayaon.
word.hebrew: יג כבוד הלבנון אליך יבוא ברוש תדהר ותאשור יחדו--לפאר מקום מקדשי ומקום רגלי אכבד
word.hebrewmodern: כבוד הלבנון אליך יבוא ברוש תדהר ותאשור יחדו לפאר מקום מקדשי ומקום רגלי אכבד׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἡ δόξα τοῦ λιβάνου πρὸς σὲ ἥξει ἐν κυπαρίσσῳ καὶ πεύκῃ καὶ κέδρῳ ἅμα δοξάσαι τὸν τόπον τὸν ἅγιόν μου

word.kjv: The sons also of them that afflicted thee shall come bending unto thee; and all they that despised thee shall bow themselves down at the soles of thy feet; and they shall call thee, The city of the LORD, The Zion of the Holy One of Israel.
word.thailand: บุตรชายของคนเหล่านั้นที่ได้บีบบังคับเจ้าจะมาโค้งลงต่อเจ้า และบรรดาผู้ที่ดูหมิ่นเจ้าจะกราบลงที่ฝ่าเท้าของเจ้า เขาทั้งหลายจะเรียกเจ้าว่า `เป็นพระนครของพระเยโฮวาห์ ศิโยนแห่งองค์บริสุทธิ์ของอิสราเอล'
word.spanish1909: Y vendrán á ti humillados los hijos de los que te afligieron, y á las pisadas de tus pies se encorvarán todos los que te escarnecían, y llamarte han Ciudad de Jehová, Sión del Santo de Israel.
word.latinvulgate: Et venient ad te curvi filii eorum qui humiliaverunt te, et adorabunt vestigia pedum tuorum omnes qui detrahebant tibi, et vocabunt te civitatem Domini, Sion Sancti Israël.
word.italian1927: E i figliuoli di quelli che t’avranno oppressa verranno a te, abbassandosi; e tutti quelli che t’avranno disprezzata si prostreranno fino alla pianta dei tuoi piedi, e ti chiameranno "la città dell’Eterno", "la Sion del Santo d’Israele".
word.german1912: Es werden auch gebückt zu dir kommen, die dich unterdrückt haben; und alle; die dich gelästert haben, werden niederfallen zu deinen Füßen und werden dich nennen eine Stadt des HERRN, ein Zion des Heiligen in Israel.
word.french1910: Les fils de tes oppresseurs viendront s'humilier devant toi, Et tous ceux qui te méprisaient se prosterneront à tes pieds; Ils t'appelleront ville de l'Eternel, Sion du Saint d'Israël.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那些素來苦待你的人，他們的子孫都必屈身來到你那裡；所有藐視你的，都要在你的腳下跪拜；他們要稱你為耶和華的城、以色列聖者的錫安。
word.korean: 너를 괴롭게 하던 자의 자손이 몸을 굽혀 네게 나아오며 너를 멸시하던 모든 자가 네 발 아래 엎드리어 너를 일컬어 여호와의 성읍이라 이스라엘의 거룩한 자의 시온이라 하리라
word.tagalog: At ang mga anak nila na dumalamhati sa iyo ay magsisiparoong yuyuko sa iyo; at silang lahat na nagsisihamak sa iyo ay magpapatirapa sa mga talampakan ng iyong mga paa; at tatanawin ka nila Ang bayan ng Panginoon, Ang Sion ng Banal ng Israel.
word.maori: Ka haere mai ano, ka piko ki a koe nga tama a ou kaitukino, a ko te hunga katoa i whakahawea ki a koe, ka piko ki nga kapu o ou waewae; a ka kiia koe, Ko te pa o Ihowa, Ko te Hiona o te Mea Tapu o Iharaira.
word.cebuano: Ug ang mga anak nga lalake niadtong nanagsakit kanimo manganhi nga managyukbo kanimo; ug silang tanan nga nanagbiay-biay kanimo managhapa sa mga lapalapa sa imong mga tiil; ug ikaw pagatawgon nila Ang ciudad ni Jehova, Ang Sion sa Balaan sa Israel.
word.hebrew: יד והלכו אליך שחוח בני מעניך והשתחוו על כפות רגליך כל מנאציך וקראו לך עיר יהוה ציון קדוש ישראל
word.hebrewmodern: והלכו אליך שחוח בני מעניך והשתחוו על כפות רגליך כל מנאציך וקראו לך עיר יהוה ציון קדוש ישראל׃
word.greekot: καὶ πορεύσονται πρὸς σὲ δεδοικότες υἱοὶ ταπεινωσάντων σε καὶ παροξυνάντων σε καὶ κληθήσῃ πόλις κυρίου σιων ἁγίου ισραηλ

word.kjv: Give glory to the LORD your God, before he cause darkness, and before your feet stumble upon the dark mountains, and, while ye look for light, he turn it into the shadow of death, and make it gross darkness.
word.thailand: จงถวายสง่าราศีแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ พระเจ้าของเจ้าทั้งหลาย ก่อนที่พระองค์จะทรงนำความมืดมา ก่อนที่เท้าของเจ้าจะสะดุดบนภูเขาที่มีแสงโพล้เพล้ และขณะเมื่อเจ้าทั้งหลายมองหาความสว่าง พระองค์ทรงกลับให้เป็นเงามัจจุราช และทรงกระทำให้เป็นความมืดทึบ
word.spanish1909: Dad gloria á Jehová Dios vuestro, antes que haga venir tinieblas, y antes que vuestros pies tropiecen en montes de oscuridad, y esperéis luz, y os la torne sombra de muerte y tinieblas.
word.latinvulgate: Date Domino Deo vestro gloriam antequam contenebrescat, et antequam offendant pedes vestri ad montes caliginosos : exspectabitis lucem, et ponet eam in umbram mortis, et in caliginem.
word.italian1927: Date gloria all’Eterno, al vostro Dio, prima ch’ei faccia venir le tenebre, e prima che i vostri piedi inciampino sui monti avvolti nel crepuscolo, e voi aspettiate la luce ed egli ne faccia un’ombra di morte, e la muti in oscurità profonda.
word.german1912: Gebet dem HERRN, eurem Gott, die Ehre, ehe denn es finster werde, und ehe eure Füße sich an den dunklen Bergen stoßen, daß ihr des Lichts wartet, so er's doch gar finster und dunkel machen wird.
word.french1910: Rendez gloire à l'Eternel, votre Dieu, Avant qu'il fasse venir les ténèbres, Avant que vos pieds heurtent contre les montagnes de la nuit; Vous attendrez la lumière, Et il la changera en ombre de la mort, Il la réduira en obscurité profonde.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華你們的　神還沒有使黑暗臨到以前，你們的腳還沒有在昏暗的山上絆倒之前，你們要把榮耀歸給他。你們期待光明，他卻把光明變為死蔭，使光明變成黝黑。
word.korean: 그가 흑암을 일으키시기전, 너희 발이 흑암한 산에 거치기전, 너희 바라는 빛이 사망의 그늘로 변하여 침침한 흑암이 되게 하시기 전에 너희 하나님 여호와께 영광을 돌리라
word.tagalog: Luwalhatiin ninyo ang Panginoon ninyong Dios, bago siya magpadilim, at bago matisod ang inyong mga paa sa mga madilim na bundok, at, habang kayo'y nangaghihintay ng liwanag, ay kaniyang gagawing lilim ng kamatayan, at papagsasalimuutin niya ang kadiliman.
word.maori: Whakakororiatia to koutou Atua, a Ihowa, i te mea kiano ia i whakapouri noa, i te mea kiano o koutou waewae i tutuki i runga i nga maunga pouri, i te mea hoki e tatari ana koutou ki te marama, na kua puta ke i a ia ko te atarangi o te mate, kua meinga kia pouri kerekere.
word.cebuano: Paghatag ug himaya kang Jehova nga imong Dios, sa dili pa siya magapangiub, ug sa dili pa ang inyong mga tiil mahapangdol sa mangitngit nga kabukiran, ug, samtang nga nagapangita kamo sa kahayag, iyang giliso kini nga landong sa kamatayon, ug gihimo kini nga mabaga nga kangitngit.
word.hebrew: טז תנו ליהוה אלהיכם כבוד בטרם יחשך ובטרם יתנגפו רגליכם על הרי נשף וקויתם לאור ושמה לצלמות ישית (ושית) לערפל
word.hebrewmodern: תנו ליהוה אלהיכם כבוד בטרם יחשך ובטרם יתנגפו רגליכם על הרי נשף וקויתם לאור ושמה לצלמות ישית לערפל׃
word.greekot: δότε τῷ κυρίῳ θεῷ ὑμῶν δόξαν πρὸ τοῦ συσκοτάσαι καὶ πρὸς τοῦ προσκόψαι πόδας ὑμῶν ἐπ' ὄρη σκοτεινὰ καὶ ἀναμενεῖτε εἰς φῶς καὶ ἐκεῖ σκιὰ θανάτου καὶ τεθήσονται εἰς σκότος

word.kjv: Thus saith the LORD unto this people, Thus have they loved to wander, they have not refrained their feet, therefore the LORD doth not accept them; he will now remember their iniquity, and visit their sins.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสแก่ชนชาตินี้ว่า "เขาทั้งหลายรักที่จะพเนจรไปอย่างนี้ เขาทั้งหลายไม่ยับยั้งเท้าของเขาไว้ ฉะนั้นพระเยโฮวาห์จึงไม่ทรงรับเขา บัดนี้พระองค์จะทรงระลึกถึงความชั่วช้าของเขา และลงโทษการผิดบาปของเขา"
word.spanish1909: Así ha dicho Jehová á este pueblo: Así amaron moverse, ni detuvieron sus pies: por tanto, Jehová no los tiene en voluntad; acordaráse ahora de la maldad de ellos, y visitará sus pecados.
word.latinvulgate: Hæc dicit Dominus populo huic, qui dilexit movere pedes suos, et non quievit, et Domino non placuit : nunc recordabitur iniquitatum eorum, et visitabit peccata eorum.
word.italian1927: Così parla l’Eterno a questo popolo: Essi amano andar vagando; non trattengono i loro piedi; perciò l’Eterno non li gradisce, si ricorda ora della loro iniquità, e punisce i loro peccati.
word.german1912: So spricht der HERR von diesem Volk: Sie laufen gern hin und wieder und bleiben nicht gern daheim; darum will sie der HERR nicht, sondern er denkt nun an ihre Missetat und will ihre Sünden heimsuchen.
word.french1910: Voici ce que l'Eternel dit de ce peuple: Ils aiment à courir çà et là, Ils ne savent retenir leurs pieds; L'Eternel n'a point d'attachement pour eux, Il se souvient maintenant de leurs crimes, Et il châtie leurs péchés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華論到這人民這樣說：“他們喜愛這樣流蕩，不約束自己的腳；因此耶和華不悅納他們，現在就要記念他們的罪孽，並要懲罰他們的罪惡。”
word.korean: 여호와께서 이 백성에 대하여 말씀하시되 그들이 어그러진 길을 사랑하여 그 발을 금하지 아니하므로 나 여호와가 그들을 받지 아니하고 이제 그들의 죄를 기억하고 그 죄를 벌하리라 하시고
word.tagalog: Ganito ang sabi ng Panginoon sa bayang ito, Yamang kanilang inibig ang paglaboy; hindi nila pinigil ang kanilang mga paa: kaya't hindi sila tinatanggap ng Panginoon; ngayo'y aalalahanin niya ang kanilang kasamaan, at dadalawin ang kanilang mga kasalanan.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te kupu tenei a Ihowa ki tenei iwi, He pena tonu to ratou matenui ki te taihaere; kihai i kaiponuhia o ratou waewae; no reira kahore a Ihowa e manako ki a ratou; ka mahara ia aianei ki o ratou he, a ka whiu i o ratou hara.
word.cebuano: Mao kini ang giingon ni Jehova niini nga katawohan: Ngani sila nahagugma nga magsalaag; sila wala makapugong sa ilang mga tiil; busa si Jehova wala modawat kanila; karon mahanumdum siya sa ilang kadautan, ug du-awon ang ilang mga sala.
word.hebrew: י כה אמר יהוה לעם הזה כן אהבו לנוע--רגליהם לא חשכו ויהוה לא רצם--עתה יזכר עונם ויפקד חטאתם  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: כה אמר יהוה לעם הזה כן אהבו לנוע רגליהם לא חשכו ויהוה לא רצם עתה יזכר עונם ויפקד חטאתם׃
word.greekot: οὕτως λέγει κύριος τῷ λαῷ τούτῳ ἠγάπησαν κινεῖν πόδας αὐτῶν καὶ οὐκ ἐφείσαντο καὶ ὁ θεὸς οὐκ εὐδόκησεν ἐν αὐτοῖς νῦν μνησθήσεται τῶν ἀδικιῶν αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Let a cry be heard from their houses, when thou shalt bring a troop suddenly upon them: for they have digged a pit to take me, and hid snares for my feet.
word.thailand: ขอให้ได้ยินเสียงร้องมาจากเรือนของเขาทั้งหลาย เมื่อพระองค์ทรงพากองทหารมาปล้นเขาอย่างฉับพลัน เพราะเขาทั้งหลายได้ขุดหลุมไว้ดักข้าพระองค์ และวางบ่วงดักเท้าของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Oigase clamor de sus casas, cuando trajeres sobre ellos ejército de repente: porque cavaron hoyo para prenderme, y á mis pies han escondido lazos.
word.latinvulgate: audiatur clamor de domibus eorum : adduces enim super eos latronem repente, quia foderunt foveam ut caperent me, et laqueos absconderunt pedibus meis.
word.italian1927: Un grido s’oda uscire dalle loro case, quando tu farai piombar su loro a un tratto le bande nemiche: poiché hanno scavata una fossa per pigliarmi, e han teso de’ lacci ai miei piedi.
word.german1912: daß ein Geschrei aus ihren Häusern gehört werde, wie du plötzlich habest Kriegsvolk über sie kommen lassen. Denn sie haben eine Grube gegraben, mich zu fangen, und meinen Füßen Stricke gelegt.
word.french1910: Qu'on entende des cris sortir de leurs maisons, Quand soudain tu feras fondre sur eux des bandes armées! Car ils ont creusé une fosse pour me prendre, Ils ont tendu des filets sous mes pieds.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你使侵略者忽然臨到他們的時候，願人從他們的屋裡聽見呼救聲；因為他們挖陷坑要捉拿我，埋藏網羅要絆我的腳。
word.korean: 주께서 군대로 졸지에 그들에게 임하게 하사 그들의 집에서 부르짖음이 들리게 하옵소서 이는 그들이 나를 취하려고 구덩이를 팠고 내 발을 빠치려고 올무를 베풀었음이니이다
word.tagalog: Makarinig nawa ng daing mula sa kanilang mga bahay, pagka ikaw ay biglang magdadala ng hukbo sa kanila; sapagka't sila'y nagsihukay ng hukay upang hulihin ako, at ipinagkubli ng mga silo ang aking mga paa.
word.maori: Kia rangona he tangi i roto i o ratou whare, ina kawea e koe he ope huaki tata ki a ratou: kua keria hoki e ratou he rua hei hopu i ahau, kua huna hoki he rore mo oku waewae.
word.cebuano: Padungga sila ug pagsiyagit gikan sa ilang mga balay, sa diha nga sa kalit padad-an mo sila ug mga sundalo: kay sila nanagkalot ug gahong aron sa pagdakup kanako, ug nanagtago ug mga lit-ag alang sa akong mga tiil.
word.hebrew: כב תשמע זעקה מבתיהם כי תביא עליהם גדוד פתאם  כי כרו שיחה (שוחה) ללכדני ופחים טמנו לרגלי
word.hebrewmodern: תשמע זעקה מבתיהם כי תביא עליהם גדוד פתאם כי כרו שיחה ללכדני ופחים טמנו לרגלי׃
word.greekot: γενηθήτω κραυγὴ ἐν ταῖς οἰκίαις αὐτῶν ἐπάξεις ἐπ' αὐτοὺς λῃστὰς ἄφνω ὅτι ἐνεχείρησαν λόγον εἰς σύλλημψίν μου καὶ παγίδας ἔκρυψαν ἐπ' ἐμέ

word.kjv: And, behold, all the women that are left in the king of Judah's house shall be brought forth to the king of Babylon's princes, and those women shall say, Thy friends have set thee on, and have prevailed against thee: thy feet are sunk in the mire, and they are turned away back.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด บรรดาผู้หญิงที่เหลืออยู่ในวังของกษัตริย์แห่งยูดาห์จะได้ถูกนำออกไปให้พวกเจ้านายของกษัตริย์แห่งบาบิโลน และผู้หญิงเหล่านั้นจะว่า `เพื่อนทั้งหลายของพระองค์ได้หลอกลวงพระองค์ และได้ชนะพระองค์แล้ว เมื่อพระบาทของพระองค์จมลงในโคลนแล้ว เขาทั้งหลายก็หันไปจากพระองค์'
word.spanish1909: Y he aquí que todas las mujeres que han quedado en casa del rey de Judá, serán sacadas á los príncipes del rey de Babilonia; y ellas mismas dirán: Te han engañado, y prevalecido contra ti tus amigos; atollaron en el cieno tus pies, se volvieron atrás.
word.latinvulgate: ecce omnes mulieres quæ remanserunt in domo regis Juda educentur ad principes regis Babylonis, et ipsæ dicent : Seduxerunt te, et prævaluerunt adversum te, viri pacifici tui : demerserunt in cœno et in lubrico pedes tuos, et recesserunt a te.
word.italian1927: Tutte le donne rimaste nella casa del re di Giuda saranno menate fuori ai capi del re di Babilonia; e queste donne diranno: I tuoi familiari amici t’hanno incitato, t’hanno vinto; i tuoi piedi sono affondati nel fango, e quelli si son ritirati".
word.german1912: Siehe, alle Weiber, die noch vorhanden sind in dem Hause des Königs in Juda, werden hinaus müssen zu den Fürsten des Königs zu Babel; diese werden dann sagen: Ach deine Tröster haben dich überredet und verführt und in Schlamm geführt und lassen dich nun stecken.
word.french1910: Toutes les femmes qui restent dans la maison du roi de Juda seront menées aux chefs du roi de Babylone, et elles diront: Tu as été trompé, dominé, par ceux qui t'annonçaient la paix; et quand tes pieds sont enfoncés dans la boue, ils se retirent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 看哪！猶大王宮裡所有剩下的婦女，都必被帶出來，去到巴比倫王的將領那裡。那些婦女必對你說：‘你的盟友煽惑了你，左右了你；現在你的腳陷在泥沼中，他們就都離棄你。’
word.korean: 곧 유다 왕궁에 남아 있는 모든 여자가 바벨론 왕의 방백들에게로 끌려갈 것이요 그들은 네게 말하기를 네 친구들이 너를 꾀어 이기고 네 발이 진흙에 빠짐을 보고 물러갔도다 하리라
word.tagalog: Narito, lahat ng babae na naiwan sa bahay ng hari sa Juda ay malalabas sa mga prinsipe ng hari sa Babilonia, at ang mga babaing yaon ay mangagsasabi, Hinikayat ka ng iyong mga kasamasamang mga kaibigan, at nanaig sa iyo: ngayon ang iyong paa nga ay nalubog sa burak, at sila'y nagsitalikod.
word.maori: Inana, ko nga wahine katoa e mahue ana ki te whare o te kingi o Hura ka whakaputaina ki waho ki nga rangatira a te kingi o Papurona, a ka mea aua wahine, i tohea koe e ou hoa aroha, a riro ana koe i ta ratou: na, ka totohu nei ou waewae ki te pa ru, kua hoki ke atu ratou ki muri.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang tanang mga babaye nga nanghibilin sa balay sa hari sa Juda pagadad-on ngadto sa mga principe sa hari sa Babilonia, ug kadtong mga babayehana manag-ingon: Ang imong mga suod nga higala naglimbong kanimo, ug nakadaug kanimo: karon nga ang imong mga tiil nanghiunlod sa kalapukan, sila mingsibog.
word.hebrew: כב והנה כל הנשים אשר נשארו בבית מלך יהודה מוצאות אל שרי מלך בבל והנה אמרת הסיתוך ויכלו לך אנשי שלמך הטבעו בבץ רגלך נסגו אחור
word.hebrewmodern: והנה כל הנשים אשר נשארו בבית מלך יהודה מוצאות אל שרי מלך בבל והנה אמרות הסיתוך ויכלו לך אנשי שלמך הטבעו בבץ רגלך נסגו אחור׃
word.greekot: ἕως πότε ἀποστρέψεις θυγάτηρ ἠτιμωμένη ὅτι ἔκτισεν κύριος σωτηρίαν εἰς καταφύτευσιν καινήν ἐν σωτηρίᾳ περιελεύσονται ἄνθρωποι

word.kjv: From above hath he sent fire into my bones, and it prevaileth against them: he hath spread a net for my feet, he hath turned me back: he hath made me desolate and faint all the day.
word.thailand: พระองค์ได้ทรงส่งเพลิงลงมาจากเบื้องบนให้เข้าไปเหนือกระดูกทั้งหลายของข้าพเจ้า และเพลิงนั้นก็มีชัยชนะต่อกระดูกเหล่านั้น พระองค์ได้ทรงกางตาข่ายไว้ดักเท้าของข้าพเจ้า พระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำให้ข้าพเจ้าต้องหันกลับ พระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำให้ข้าพเจ้าโดดเดี่ยวอ้างว้าง และอ่อนระอาตลอดทั้งวัน
word.spanish1909: Desde lo alto envió fuego en mis huesos, el cual se enseñoreó: Ha extendido red a mis pies, tornóme atrás, Púsome asolada, y que siempre tenga dolor.
word.latinvulgate: MEM. De excelso misit ignem in ossibus meis, et erudivit me : expandit rete pedibus meis, convertit me retrorsum ; posuit me desolatam, tota die mœrore confectam.
word.italian1927: Dall’alto egli ha mandato un fuoco nelle mie ossa, che se n’è impadronito; egli ha teso una rete ai miei piedi, m’ha rovesciata a terra; m’ha gettata nella desolazione, in un languore di tutti i giorni.
word.german1912: Er hat ein Feuer aus der Höhe in meine Gebeine gesandt und es lassen walten. Er hat meinen Füßen ein Netz gestellt und mich zurückgeprellt; er hat mich zur Wüste gemacht, daß ich täglich trauern muß.
word.french1910: D'en haut il a lancé dans mes os un feu qui les dévore; Il a tendu un filet sous mes pieds, Il m'a fait tomber en arrière; Il m'a jetée dans la désolation, dans une langueur de tous les jours.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他從高天降火，使火進入我的骨頭裡。他設置網羅絆我的腳，使我退去。他使我孤單淒涼，終日愁煩。
word.korean: 위에서부터 나의 골수에 불을 보내어 이기게 하시고 내 발 앞에 그물을 베푸사 나로 물러가게 하셨음이여 종일토록 고적하여 곤비케 하셨도다
word.tagalog: Mula sa itaas ay nagsugo siya ng apoy sa aking mga buto, at mga pinananaigan; kaniyang ipinagladlad ng silo ang aking mga paa, kaniyang ibinalik ako: kaniyang ipinahamak ako at pinapanglupaypay buong araw.
word.maori: Kua tukua iho nei e ia i runga, he ahi ki oku wheua, a e wera ana i tera: kua horahia e ia he kupenga mo oku waewae, kua whakahokia ahau ki muri; kua tukua ahau e ia ki te kahore, ki te whakaruhi, a pau noa te ra.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa kahitas-an siya nagpadala ug kalayo sulod sa akong mga bukog, ug kini nakadaug batok kanila; Siya nagladlad ug pukot alang sa akong mga tiil, ako gipabalik niya: Ako gihimo niya nga biniyaan ug maluyahon sa tibook nga adlaw.
word.hebrew: יג ממרום שלח אש בעצמתי וירדנה פרש רשת לרגלי השיבני אחור--נתנני שממה כל היום דוה  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: ממרום שלח אש בעצמתי וירדנה פרש רשת לרגלי השיבני אחור נתנני שממה כל היום דוה׃
word.greekot: ἐξ ὕψους αὐτοῦ ἀπέστειλεν πῦρ ἐν τοῖς ὀστέοις μου κατήγαγεν αὐτό διεπέτασεν δίκτυον τοῖς ποσίν μου ἀπέστρεψέν με εἰς τὰ ὀπίσω ἔδωκέν με ἠφανισμένην ὅλην τὴν ἡμέραν ὀδυνωμένην

word.kjv: To crush under his feet all the prisoners of the earth,
word.thailand: การเหยียบย่ำบรรดาเชลยแห่งแผ่นดินโลกไว้ใต้เท้าก็ดี
word.spanish1909: Desmenuzar bajo de sus pies todos los encarcelados de la tierra,
word.latinvulgate: LAMED. Ut conteret sub pedibus suis omnes vinctos terræ.
word.italian1927: Quand’uno schiaccia sotto i piedi tutti i prigionieri della terra,
word.german1912: als wollte er die Gefangenen auf Erden gar unter seine Füße zertreten
word.french1910: Quand on foule aux pieds Tous les captifs du pays,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人把地上所有被囚的，都踐踏在腳下，
word.korean: 세상에 모든 갇힌 자를 발로 밟는 것과
word.tagalog: Na yapakan sa ilalim ng paa ang lahat ng bihag sa lupa.
word.maori: Ko te kuru i nga herehere katoa o te whenua ki raro i ona waewae;
word.cebuano: Ang pagdugmok sa ilalum sa iyang mga tiil sa tanan nga mga binilanggo sa yuta,
word.hebrew: לד לדכא תחת רגליו כל אסירי ארץ
word.hebrewmodern: לדכא תחת רגליו כל אסירי ארץ׃
word.greekot: ἐκ στόματος ὑψίστου οὐκ ἐξελεύσεται τὰ κακὰ καὶ τὸ ἀγαθόν

word.kjv: And their feet were straight feet; and the sole of their feet was like the sole of a calf's foot: and they sparkled like the colour of burnished brass.
word.thailand: เท้าของสิ่งที่มีชีวิตอยู่นั้นตรง และฝ่าเท้าก็เหมือนฝ่าตีนลูกวัว และเป็นประกายอย่างทองสัมฤทธิ์ขัด
word.spanish1909: Y los pies de ellos eran derechos, y la planta de sus pies como la planta de pie de becerro; y centelleaban á manera de bronce muy bruñido.
word.latinvulgate: Pedes eorum, pedes recti, et planta pedis eorum quasi planta pedis vituli : et scintillæ quasi aspectus æris candentis.
word.italian1927: I loro piedi eran diritti, e la pianta de’ loro piedi era come la pianta del piede d’un vitello; e sfavillavano come il rame terso.
word.german1912: Und ihre Beine standen gerade, und ihre Füße waren gleich wie Rinderfüße und glänzten wie helles glattes Erz. {~}
word.french1910: Leurs pieds étaient droits, et la plante de leurs pieds était comme celle du pied d'un veau, ils étincelaient comme de l'airain poli.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 牠們的腿是直的，腳掌像牛犢的蹄，都很燦爛，像擦亮了的銅。
word.korean: 그 다리는 곧고 그 발바닥은 송아지 발바닥 같고 마광한 구리같이 빛나며
word.tagalog: At ang kanilang mga paa ay mga matuwid na paa; at ang talampakan ng kanilang mga paa ay parang talampakan ng paa ng isang guya; at sila'y nagsisikinang na parang kulay ng tansong binuli.
word.maori: Ko o ratou waewae, he waewae tika tonu; ko te kapu ano o o ratou waewae rite tonu ki te kapu o te waewae o te kuao kua: wheriko tonu, rite tonu ki te kanapatanga o te parahi kua oti te oro.
word.cebuano: Ug ang ilang mga tiil maoy mga tiil nga matul-id; ug ang lapalapa sa ilang mga tiil sama sa lapalapa sa tiil sa usa ka nating vaca; ug kini sila nanagpangidlap sama sa pinasinaw nga tumbaga.
word.hebrew: ז ורגליהם רגל ישרה וכף רגליהם ככף רגל עגל ונצצים כעין נחשת קלל
word.hebrewmodern: ורגליהם רגל ישרה וכף רגליהם ככף רגל עגל ונצצים כעין נחשת קלל׃
word.greekot: καὶ τὰ σκέλη αὐτῶν ὀρθά καὶ πτερωτοὶ οἱ πόδες αὐτῶν καὶ σπινθῆρες ὡς ἐξαστράπτων χαλκός καὶ ἐλαφραὶ αἱ πτέρυγες αὐτῶν

word.kjv: And he said unto me, Son of man, stand upon thy feet, and I will speak unto thee.
word.thailand: พระองค์ตรัสกับข้าพเจ้าว่า "บุตรแห่งมนุษย์เอ๋ย ยืนขึ้น เราจะพูดกับเจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Y DIJOME: Hijo del hombre, está sobre tus pies, y hablaré contigo.
word.latinvulgate: Hæc visio similitudinis gloriæ Domini. Et vidi, et cecidi in faciem meam, et audivi vocem loquentis, et dixit ad me : Fili hominis, sta super pedes tuos, et loquar tecum.
word.italian1927: E mi disse: "Figliuol d’uomo, rizzati in piedi, e io ti parlerò".
word.german1912: Und er sprach zu mir: Du Menschenkind, tritt auf deine Füße, so will ich mit dir reden.
word.french1910: Il me dit: Fils de l'homme, tiens-toi sur tes pieds, et je te parlerai.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以西結受感作先知他對我說：“人子啊！站起來，我要跟你說話。”
word.korean: 그가 내게 이르시되 인자야 ! 일어서라 내가 네게 말하리라 하시며
word.tagalog: At sinabi niya sa akin, Anak ng tao, tumayo ka ng iyong mga paa, at ako'y makikipagsalitaan sa iyo.
word.maori: ¶ Na ka mea ia ki ahau, E te tama a te tangata, e tu ou waewae ki runga, a ka korero ahau ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Ug siya miingon kanako: Anak sa tawo, tumindog ka, ug ako makigsulti kanimo.
word.hebrew: א ויאמר אלי  בן אדם עמד על רגליך ואדבר אתך
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אלי בן אדם עמד על רגליך ואדבר אתך׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν πρός με υἱὲ ἀνθρώπου στῆθι ἐπὶ τοὺς πόδας σου καὶ λαλήσω πρὸς σέ

word.kjv: And the spirit entered into me when he spake unto me, and set me upon my feet, that I heard him that spake unto me.
word.thailand: และเมื่อพระองค์ตรัสกับข้าพเจ้าพระวิญญาณได้เข้าไปในข้าพเจ้าและตั้งข้าพเจ้าให้ยืนขึ้น และข้าพเจ้าได้ยินพระองค์นั้นผู้ตรัสกับข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Y entró espíritu en mí luego que me habló, y afirmóme sobre mis pies, y oía al que me hablaba.
word.latinvulgate: Et ingressus est in me spiritus postquam locutus est mihi, et statuit me supra pedes meos : et audivi loquentem ad me,
word.italian1927: E com’egli mi parlava, lo spirito entrò in me, e mi fece rizzare in piedi; e io udii colui che mi parlava.
word.german1912: Und da er so mit mir redete, ward ich erquickt und trat auf meine Füße und hörte dem zu, der mit mir redete. {~}
word.french1910: Dès qu'il m'eut adressé ces mots, l'esprit entra en moi et me fit tenir sur mes pieds; et j'entendis celui qui me parlait.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他對我說話的時候，靈就進到我裡面，使我站立起來；我又聽見對我說話的聲音。
word.korean: 말씀하실 때에 그 신이 내게 임하사 나를 일으켜 세우시기로 내가 그 말씀하시는 자의 소리를 들으니
word.tagalog: At ang Espiritu ay sumaakin nang siya'y magsalita sa akin, at itinayo ako sa aking mga paa; at aking narinig siya na nagsasalita sa akin.
word.maori: Na kua tae mai te wairua ki roto ki ahau i tana korerotanga ki ahau, i tana meatanga kia tu oku waewae ki runga; a ka rongo ahau i a ia e korero ana ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Ug ang Espiritu misulod kanako sa diha nga siya misulti kanako, ug gipatindog ako, ug ako nakadungog kaniya nga nakigsulti kanako.
word.hebrew: ב ותבא בי רוח כאשר דבר אלי ותעמדני על רגלי ואשמע את מדבר אלי  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: ותבא בי רוח כאשר דבר אלי ותעמדני על רגלי ואשמע את מדבר אלי׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἦλθεν ἐπ' ἐμὲ πνεῦμα καὶ ἀνέλαβέν με καὶ ἐξῆρέν με καὶ ἔστησέν με ἐπὶ τοὺς πόδας μου καὶ ἤκουον αὐτοῦ λαλοῦντος πρός με

word.kjv: Then the spirit entered into me, and set me upon my feet, and spake with me, and said unto me, Go, shut thyself within thine house.
word.thailand: แต่พระวิญญาณได้เสด็จเข้าในข้าพเจ้ากระทำให้ข้าพเจ้ายืนขึ้น และพระองค์ตรัสกับข้าพเจ้า และทรงบอกข้าพเจ้าว่า "จงไป ขังตัวเจ้าไว้ภายในเรือนของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Entonces entró espíritu en mí, y afirmóme sobre mis pies, y hablóme, y díjome: Entra, y enciérrate dentro de tu casa.
word.latinvulgate: Et ingressus est in me spiritus, et statuit me super pedes meos, et locutus est mihi, et dixit ad me : Ingredere, et includere in medio domus tuæ.
word.italian1927: Ma lo spirito entrò in me; mi fece rizzare in piedi, e l’Eterno mi parlò e mi disse: "Va’, chiuditi in casa tua!
word.german1912: Und ich ward erquickt und trat auf meine Füße. Und er redete mit mir und sprach zu mir: Gehe hin und verschließ dich in deinem Hause! {~}
word.french1910: L'esprit entra en moi, et me fit tenir sur mes pieds. Et l'Eternel me parla et me dit: Va t'enfermer dans ta maison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 靈進到我裡面，使我站立起來，耶和華對我說：“你進去，把自己關在家裡。
word.korean: 주의 신이 내게 임하사 나를 일으켜 세우시고 내게 말씀하여 가라사대 너는 가서 네 집에 들어가 문을 닫으라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y suma akin ang Espiritu, at itinayo ako sa aking mga paa; at siya'y nakipagsalitaan sa akin, at nagsabi sa akin, Yumaon ka, magsara ka sa loob ng iyong bahay.
word.maori: Katahi ka uru te wairua ki roto ki ahau, a ka meinga e ia oku waewae kia tu ki runga: na ka korero mai ia ki ahau, ka mea ki ahau, Haere, tutakina atu koe ki roto ki tou whare.
word.cebuano: Unya ang Espiritu misulod kanako, ug nagpatindog kanako sa akong mga tiil; ug siya nakigsulti kanako, ug miingon kanako: Lakaw, takpi ang imong kaugalingon sulod sa imong balay.
word.hebrew: כד ותבא בי רוח ותעמדני על רגלי וידבר אתי ויאמר אלי בא הסגר בתוך ביתך
word.hebrewmodern: ותבא בי רוח ותעמדני על רגלי וידבר אתי ויאמר אלי בא הסגר בתוך ביתך׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἦλθεν ἐπ' ἐμὲ πνεῦμα καὶ ἔστησέν με ἐπὶ πόδας μου καὶ ἐλάλησεν πρός με καὶ εἶπέν μοι εἴσελθε καὶ ἐγκλείσθητι ἐν μέσῳ τοῦ οἴκου σου

word.kjv: Thou hast built thy high place at every head of the way, and hast made thy beauty to be abhorred, and hast opened thy feet to every one that passed by, and multiplied thy whoredoms.
word.thailand: หัวถนนทุกแห่งเจ้าสร้างที่สูงของเจ้า และเอาความงามของเจ้ามาทำลามก อ้าเท้าของเจ้าให้ผู้ที่ผ่านไปมาไม่ว่าใคร และทวีการเล่นชู้ของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: En toda cabeza de camino edificaste tu altar, y tornaste abominable tu hermosura, y abriste tus piernas á cuantos pasaban, y multiplicaste tus fornicaciones.
word.latinvulgate: Ad omne caput viæ ædificasti signum prostitutionis tuæ, et abominabilem fecisti decorem tuum : et divisisti pedes tuos omni transeunti, et multiplicasti fornicationes tuas :
word.italian1927: hai costruito un alto luogo a ogni capo di strada, hai reso abominevole la tua bellezza, ti sei offerta ad ogni passante, ed hai moltiplicato le tue prostituzioni.
word.german1912: und vornan auf allen Straßen bautest du deine Altäre und machtest deine Schöne zu eitel Greuel; du spreiztest deine Beine gegen alle, so vorübergingen, und triebst große Hurerei.
word.french1910: l'entrée de chaque chemin tu as construit tes hauts lieux, tu as déshonoré ta beauté, tu t'es livrée à tous les passants, tu as multiplié tes prostitutions.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你在各路口建造高壇，使你的美麗變為可憎的，又向每一個過路的人張開兩腿，多行淫亂。
word.korean: 네가 높은 대를 모든 길 머리에 쌓고 네 아름다움을 가증하게 하여 모든 지나가는 자에게 다리를 벌려 심히 행음하고
word.tagalog: Itinayo mo ang iyong mataas na dako sa bawa't bukana ng daan, at ginawa mong kasuklamsuklam ang iyong kagandahan, at ibinuka mo ang iyong mga paa sa bawa't nagdaraan, at pinarami mo ang iyong pakikiapid.
word.maori: Kua hanga ano e koe tau wahi tiketike ki nga ahunga katoa o nga ara, meinga ana e koe tou ataahua kia whakariharihangia, whewhera tonu ou waewae ki nga tangata e haere ana i tou taha, whakamaha ana e koe tou kairautanga.
word.cebuano: Nagtukod ka sa imong hataas nga dapit sa tagsatagsa ka ulohan sa dalan, ug ang imong katahum gihimo mo nga dulumtanan, ug gibilangkad mo ang imong mga tiil sa tagsatagsa nga miagi diha , ug gipadaghan mo ang imong pagpakighilawas.
word.hebrew: כה אל כל ראש דרך בנית רמתך ותתעבי את יפיך ותפשקי את רגליך לכל עובר ותרבי את תזנותך (תזנותיך)
word.hebrewmodern: אל כל ראש דרך בנית רמתך ותתעבי את יפיך ותפשקי את רגליך לכל עובר ותרבי את תזנתך׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπ' ἀρχῆς πάσης ὁδοῦ ᾠκοδόμησας τὰ πορνεῖά σου καὶ ἐλυμήνω τὸ κάλλος σου καὶ διήγαγες τὰ σκέλη σου παντὶ παρόδῳ καὶ ἐπλήθυνας τὴν πορνείαν σου

word.kjv: Forbear to cry, make no mourning for the dead, bind the tire of thine head upon thee, and put on thy shoes upon thy feet, and cover not thy lips, and eat not the bread of men.
word.thailand: จงอดกลั้น ไม่คร่ำครวญเถิด อย่าไว้ทุกข์ให้คนที่ตาย จงโพกผ้าของเจ้า และสวมรองเท้าของเจ้า อย่าปิดริมฝีปากหรือรับประทานอาหารของเขา"
word.spanish1909: Reprime el suspirar, no hagas luto de mortuorios: ata tu bonete sobre ti, y pon tus zapatos en tus pies, y no te cubras con rebozo, ni comas pan de hombres.
word.latinvulgate: Ingemisce tacens : mortuorum luctum non facies : corona tua circumligata sit tibi, et calceamenta tua erunt in pedibus tuis : nec amictu ora velabis, nec cibos lugentium comedes.
word.italian1927: Sospira in silenzio; non portar lutto per i morti, cingiti il capo col turbante, mettiti i calzari ai piedi, non ti coprire la barba, non mangiare il pane che la gente ti manda".
word.german1912: Heimlich magst du seufzen, aber keine Totenklage führen; sondern du sollst deinen Schmuck anlegen und deine Schuhe anziehen. Du sollst deinen Mund nicht verhüllen und nicht das Trauerbrot essen.
word.french1910: Soupire en silence, ne prends pas le deuil des morts, attache ton turban, mets ta chaussure à tes pieds, ne te couvre pas la barbe, et ne mange pas le pain des autres.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 只可靜默地歎息，不可為死人哀悼；你的頭上仍要纏著頭巾，腳上仍要穿著鞋子；你不可蒙著臉，也不可吃為喪家預備的食物。”
word.korean: 죽은 자들을 위하여 슬퍼하지 말고 종용히 탄식하며 수건으로 머리를 동이고 발에 신을 신고 입술을 가리우지 말고 사람의 부의하는 식물을 먹지 말라 하신지라
word.tagalog: Magbuntong-hininga ka, nguni't huwag malakas; huwag mong tangisan ang patay; itali mo ang pugong mo sa ulo, at isuot mo ang iyong mga panyapak sa iyong mga paa, at huwag mong takpan ang iyong mga labi, at huwag kang kumain ng tinapay ng mga tao.
word.maori: E tangi, engari kia ngawari; kauaka he uhunga tupapaku, herea tou tupare ki runga ki a koe, kuhua ano ou hu ki ou waewae, kaua ano ou ngutu e araia, kaua ano e kainga te taro tangata.
word.cebuano: Panghupaw, apan dili sa makusog, ayaw pagbangutan tungod sa mga nangamatay; baligtosa ang purong sa imong ulo, ug isul-ob ang mga sapin sa imong mga tiil, ug ayaw pagtaboni ang imong mga ngabil, ug ayaw pagkaon sa tinapay sa mga tawo.
word.hebrew: יז האנק דם מתים אבל לא תעשה--פארך חבוש עליך ונעליך תשים ברגליך ולא תעטה על שפם ולחם אנשים לא תאכל
word.hebrewmodern: האנק דם מתים אבל לא תעשה פארך חבוש עליך ונעליך תשים ברגליך ולא תעטה על שפם ולחם אנשים לא תאכל׃
word.greekot: στεναγμὸς αἵματος ὀσφύος πένθους ἐστίν οὐκ ἔσται τὸ τρίχωμά σου συμπεπλεγμένον ἐπὶ σὲ καὶ τὰ ὑποδήματά σου ἐν τοῖς ποσίν σου οὐ μὴ παρακληθῇς ἐν χείλεσιν αὐτῶν καὶ ἄρτον ἀνδρῶν οὐ μὴ φάγῃς

word.kjv: And your tires shall be upon your heads, and your shoes upon your feet: ye shall not mourn nor weep; but ye shall pine away for your iniquities, and mourn one toward another.
word.thailand: ผ้าโพกจะอยู่บนศีรษะของเจ้า และรองเท้าจะอยู่ที่เท้าของเจ้า เจ้าจะไม่ไว้ทุกข์หรือร้องไห้ แต่เจ้าจะทรุดลงเพราะความชั่วช้าของเจ้า และจะโอดครวญแก่กันและกัน
word.spanish1909: Y vuestros bonetes estarán sobre vuestras cabezas, y vuestros zapatos en vuestros pies: no endecharéis ni lloraréis, sino que os consumiréis á causa de vuestras maldades, y gemiréis unos con otros.
word.latinvulgate: coronas habebitis in capitibus vestris, et calceamenta in pedibus : non plangetis, neque flebitis, sed tabescetis in iniquitatibus vestris, et unusquisque gemet ad fratrem suum.
word.italian1927: avrete i vostri turbanti in capo, e i vostri calzari ai piedi; non farete cordoglio e non piangerete, ma vi consumerete di languore per le vostre iniquità, e gemerete l’uno con l’altro.
word.german1912: sondern sollt euren Schmuck auf euer Haupt setzen und eure Schuhe anziehen. Ihr werdet nicht klagen noch weinen, sondern über eure Sünden verschmachten und untereinander seufzen.
word.french1910: vous aurez vos turbans sur la tête et vos chaussures aux pieds, vous ne vous lamenterez pas et vous ne pleurerez pas; mais vous serez frappés de langueur pour vos iniquités, et vous gémirez entre vous.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們的頭上仍要纏著頭巾，腳上仍要穿著鞋子；你們不可悲哀，不可哭泣；但你們必因自己的罪孽相對歎息，衰弱而死。
word.korean: 수건으로 머리를 동인 채 발에 신을 신은 채로 두고 슬퍼하지도 아니하며 울지도 아니하되 죄악 중에 쇠패하여 피차 바라보고 탄식하리라
word.tagalog: At ang inyong turbante ay malalagay sa inyong mga ulo, at ang inyong mga panyapak sa inyong mga paa: kayo'y hindi tatangis o iiyak man; kundi kayo'y manganglulupaypay sa inyong mga kasamaan, at mangagdadaingang isa't isa.
word.maori: E mau ano o koutou tupare ki o koutou mahunga, o koutou hu ki o koutou waewae; e kore koutou e uhunga, e kore e tangi; engari ka memehia atu i runga i o koutou he, ka koingo ki tetahi, ki tetahi.
word.cebuano: Ug ang inyong mga purong anha sa inyong mga ulo, ug ang inyong mga sapin anha sa inyong mga tiil: dili kamo magbangutan ni maghilak; apan kamo magakaniwang tungod sa inyong kasal-anan, ug magaagulo tungod sa usa ug usa.
word.hebrew: כג ופארכם על ראשיכם ונעליכם ברגליכם--לא תספדו ולא תבכו ונמקתם בעונתיכם ונהמתם איש אל אחיו
word.hebrewmodern: ופארכם על ראשיכם ונעליכם ברגליכם לא תספדו ולא תבכו ונמקתם בעונתיכם ונהמתם איש אל אחיו׃
word.greekot: καὶ αἱ κόμαι ὑμῶν ἐπὶ τῆς κεφαλῆς ὑμῶν καὶ τὰ ὑποδήματα ὑμῶν ἐν τοῖς ποσὶν ὑμῶν οὔτε μὴ κόψησθε οὔτε μὴ κλαύσητε καὶ ἐντακήσεσθε ἐν ταῖς ἀδικίαις ὑμῶν καὶ παρακαλέσετε ἕκαστος τὸν ἀδελφὸν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: For thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou hast clapped thine hands, and stamped with the feet, and rejoiced in heart with all thy despite against the land of Israel;
word.thailand: เพราะองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าพระเจ้าตรัสดังนี้ว่า เพราะเจ้าได้ตบมือและกระทืบเท้าและปีติด้วยใจคิดร้ายต่อแผ่นดินอิสราเอล
word.spanish1909: Porque así ha dicho el Señor Jehová: Por cuanto tú batiste tus manos, y pateaste, y te gozaste del alma en todo tu menosprecio sobre la tierra de Israel;
word.latinvulgate: Quia hæc dicit Dominus Deus : Pro eo quod plausisti manu et percussisti pede, et gavisa es ex toto affectu super terram Israël,
word.italian1927: Poiché così parla il Signore, l’Eterno: Poiché tu hai applaudito, e battuto de’ piedi, e ti sei rallegrato con tutto lo sprezzo che nutrivi dell’anima per la terra d’Israele,
word.german1912: Denn so spricht der HERR HERR: Darum daß du mit deinen Händen geklatscht und mit den Füßen gescharrt und über das Land Israel von ganzem Herzen so höhnisch dich gefreut hast,
word.french1910: Car ainsi parle le Seigneur, l'Eternel: Parce que tu as battu des mains Et frappé du pied, Parce que tu t'es réjoui dédaigneusement et du fond de l'âme Au sujet de la terre d'Israël,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主耶和華這樣說：因為你手舞足蹈，心存輕蔑，因以色列地的遭遇而歡喜。
word.korean: 나 주 여호와가 말하노라 네가 이스라엘 땅을 대하여 손뼉을 치며 발을 구르며 마음을 다하여 멸시하며 즐거워하였나니
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ganito ang sabi ng Panginoong Dios: Sapagka't pumakpak ka ng iyong mga kamay, at tumadyak ka ng mga paa, at nagalak ka ng buong paghamak ng iyong kalooban laban sa lupain ng Israel;
word.maori: Ko te kupu hoki tenei a te Ariki, a Ihowa, Na, kua papaki na ou ringa, kua takahi ou waewae, pau katoa tou ngakau ki te koa, he kino nou ki te whenua o Iharaira;
